Towards Out-Of-Distribution Generalization: A Survey
面向分布外泛化：综述

Jiashuo Liu*, Zheyan Shen*, Yue He, Xingxuan Zhang, Renzhe Xu, Han Yu, Peng Cuit
刘家硕*，沈哲岩*，何悦，张星璇，徐仁泽，于汉，崔鹏
Department of Computer Science and Technology
计算机科学与技术系
Tsinghua University
清华大学
liujiashuo77@gmail.com, shenzy13@qq.com, cuip@tsinghua.edu.cn

Abstract
摘要

Traditional machine learning paradigms are based on the assumption that both training and test data follow the same statistical pattern, which is mathematically referred to as Independent and Identically Distributed (i.i.d.). However, in real-world applications, this i.i.d. assumption often fails to hold due to unforeseen distributional shifts, leading to considerable degradation in model performance upon deployment. This observed discrepancy indicates the significance of investigating the Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization problem. OOD generalization is an emerging topic of machine learning research that focuses on complex scenarios wherein the distributions of the test data differ from those of the training data. This paper represents the first comprehensive, systematic review of OOD generalization, encompassing a spectrum of aspects from problem definition, methodological development, and evaluation procedures, to the implications and future directions of the field. Our discussion begins with a precise, formal characterization of the OOD generalization problem. Following that, we categorize existing methodologies into three segments: unsupervised representation learning, supervised model learning, and optimization, according to their positions within the overarching learning process. We provide an in-depth discussion on representative methodologies for each category, further elucidating the theoretical links between them. Subsequently, we outline the prevailing benchmark datasets employed in OOD generalization studies. To conclude, we overview the existing body of work in this domain and suggest potential avenues for future research on OOD generalization. A summary of the OOD generalization methodologies surveyed in this paper can be accessed at http://out-of-distribution-generalization.com.
传统的机器学习范式基于这样的假设：训练和测试数据遵循相同的统计模式，这在数学上被称为独立同分布（i.i.d.）。然而，在实际应用中，由于不可预见的分布变化，i.i.d. 假设往往不成立，导致模型部署后性能显著下降。这种观察到的差异凸显了研究分布外（OOD）泛化问题的意义。OOD泛化是机器学习研究的一个新兴主题，关注测试数据分布与训练数据分布不同的复杂场景。本文是关于OOD泛化的第一个全面、系统的综述，涵盖了从问题定义、方法论发展、评估程序，到领域内的含义和未来方向的广泛方面。我们的讨论从对OOD泛化问题的精确、形式化描述开始。随后，我们根据它们在整体学习过程中的位置，将现有方法分为三个部分：无监督表征学习、监督模型学习和优化。我们深入讨论了每个类别中的代表性方法，并进一步阐明它们之间的理论联系。接着，我们概述了在OOD泛化研究中普遍使用的基准数据集。最后，我们概述了该领域现有的研究成果，并提出了未来OOD泛化研究的潜在途径。本文调查的OOD泛化方法的总结可以在 http://out-of-distribution-generalization.com 访问。

1 Introduction
1 引言

Contemporary machine learning methodologies have demonstrated their superior proficiency across various domains such as natural language processing, computer vision, recommendation systems, etc. While these techniques have been observed to exceed human-level performance under controlled experimental conditions, a growing body of research has underscored the susceptibility of machine learning models to data distribution shifts. The costs of such errors vary substantially across different applications. While minor inconveniences, such as a suboptimal movie recommendation or a misclassified image, are generally tolerable, slight inaccuracies in high-stakes domains such as healthcare or autonomous driving can cause catastrophic consequences. Consequently, the exploration of Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization has emerged as a pressing concern in both academic and industrial fields, with a view to enhancing the robustness and reliability of intelligent systems across diverse real-world scenarios.
当代机器学习方法论在各种领域（如自然语言处理、计算机视觉、推荐系统等）展示了其卓越的性能。虽然这些技术在受控的实验条件下被观察到能够超越人类的性能，但越来越多的研究强调了机器学习模型对数据分布变化的敏感性。这种错误在不同应用中的成本有很大差异。虽然一些小的不便，比如一个不理想的电影推荐或一个错误分类的图像，通常是可忍受的，但在高风险领域（如医疗或自动驾驶）中即使是微小的误差也可能导致灾难性的后果。因此，探索分布外（OOD）泛化已经成为学术界和工业界紧迫的关注点，目的是提高智能系统在多种实际场景中的鲁棒性和可靠性。
*Equal contribution
*同等贡献
† Corresponding Author
† 对应作者
Despite the importance of OOD generalization, conventional supervised learning techniques cannot be straightforwardly applied to resolve it. From a theoretical standpoint, the fundamental assumption underpinning classic supervised learning is that of Independent and Identically Distributed (i.i.d.) data, postulating that the training and test datasets originate from the same distribution. However, this assumption is systematically violated in OOD generalization scenarios due to inevitable distributional shifts, rendering classical learning theory inadequate. From an empirical perspective, conventional supervised learning approaches typically focus on minimizing average training errors, greedily incorporating all correlations within the data to improve predictive accuracy. Although this strategy has proven effective in i.i.d. settings, it is detrimental to model performance under distributional shifts, as not all correlations persist in unfamiliar test distributions. Numerous studies [55,11,41,236,157] demonstrate that,when confronted with severe distributional shifts,models optimized purely based on average training errors perform poorly, often proving inferior even to random guesses. These observations underline the urgent need for tailored methodologies to address OOD generalization problems effectively.
尽管OOD泛化非常重要，传统的监督学习方法并不能直接应用于解决这个问题。从理论角度来看，经典监督学习的基础假设是独立同分布（i.i.d.）数据，即假设训练和测试数据集来源于同一分布。然而，在OOD泛化场景中，由于不可避免的数据分布变化，这一假设被系统地违反，使得经典学习理论变得不充分。从实证角度来看，传统的监督学习方法通常专注于最小化平均训练错误，贪婪地利用数据中的所有相关性来提高预测准确性。虽然这种策略在i.i.d.设置中已被证明是有效的，但在分布变化下，它对模型性能是有害的，因为并非所有的相关性都存在于不熟悉的测试分布中。许多研究[55,11,41,236,157]表明，当面临严重的分布变化时，仅基于平均训练错误优化的模型表现不佳，通常甚至比随机猜测还要差。这些观察结果强调了迫切需要定制化的方法来有效解决OOD泛化问题。
Addressing the Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization problem necessitates the resolution of several pivotal issues. First, a formal characterization of the distributional shifts is required, given that training and test data can originate from different distributions. This issue remains largely unresolved in the OOD generalization literature, with various methodological branches adopting distinct approaches to model the potential test distribution. Causal learning techniques [200,26] formulate training and test distributions using causal structures,with distributional shifts largely attributed to interventions or confounding factors. Invariant learning methodologies [181,74,75,146,11] ,on the other hand,primarily focus on real-world scenarios,leveraging data collected across diverse domains. Stable learning methods [131,132,236] introduce distributional shifts through selection bias. Second, designing an algorithm with robust OOD generalization performance is a prevalent research focus. This endeavor has given rise to multiple branches of methodologies, each with distinct research objectives, including unsupervised representation learning, supervised model learning, and optimization techniques. Third, evaluating the OOD generalization performance of various methods also poses a significant challenge. This is due to the need for specific datasets as well as evaluation metrics, as traditional benchmarks for the i.i.d. setting are not applicable. This situation further demonstrates the need for curated datasets and evaluation frameworks.
解决分布外（OOD）泛化问题需要解决几个关键问题。首先，需要对分布偏移进行正式描述，因为训练和测试数据可能来源于不同的分布。在OOD泛化文献中，这个问题在很大程度上仍未解决，各种方法论的分支采用不同的方法来模拟潜在的测试分布。因果学习技术 [200,26] 使用因果结构来构建训练和测试分布，分布偏移主要归因于干预或混杂因素。另一方面，不变性学习方法 [181,74,75,146,11] 主要关注现实世界场景，利用跨不同领域收集的数据。稳定性学习方法 [131,132,236] 通过选择偏差引入分布偏移。其次，设计具有鲁棒OOD泛化性能的算法是当前研究的一个重点。这一努力催生了多种方法论的分支，每个分支都有不同的研究目标，包括无监督表示学习、监督模型学习和优化技术。第三，评估各种方法的OOD泛化性能也构成了一个重大挑战。这是由于需要特定的数据集以及评估指标，因为传统的独立同分布（i.i.d.）设置的基准不适用。这种情况进一步证明了精心策划的数据集和评估框架的必要性。
In this paper, we aim to deliver a systematic and comprehensive survey of research undertakings in the realm of Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization. Our survey adopts an expansive view of the OOD generalization problem, encompassing all stages from its formal definition and methodological approaches, to its evaluation, implications, and prospective directions. To our knowledge, this paper represents the first effort to examine OOD generalization in such an extensive, holistic manner. While previous research efforts have addressed related topics - Wang et al. [257], Zhou et al. [309] primarily focus on domain generalization, and Ye et al. [287] discuss evaluation benchmarks for OOD generalization these works each contribute a piece of the broader OOD generalization puzzle. In contrast, our work cohesively integrates these disparate elements in a clear and succinct manner. Specifically, we classify existing methods into three categories, based on their position in the overall learning pipeline, and elaborate on the theoretical connections between different methods through the perspective of causality. To further facilitate future research in OOD generalization, we also provide a comprehensive survey of datasets to evaluate learning methods under distribution shifts.
在本文中，我们的目标是提供一个关于分布外泛化（Out-of-Distribution, OOD）研究领域的研究成果的系统性和全面性调研。我们的调研对OOD泛化问题采取了广泛的视角，涵盖了从其正式定义、方法论途径，到其评估、影响以及潜在方向的各个阶段。据我们所知，本文是首次尝试以如此广泛、整体的方式考察OOD泛化。虽然之前的研究努力涉及了相关主题——Wang等人[257]、Zhou等人[309]主要关注领域泛化，Ye等人[287]讨论了OOD泛化的评估基准，这些工作各自为OOD泛化这一更大谜题贡献了一部分。相比之下，我们的工作以清晰简洁的方式将这些不同的元素连贯地整合在一起。具体来说，我们根据现有方法在整体学习管道中的位置，将其分为三类，并通过因果关系的视角详细阐述不同方法之间的理论联系。为了进一步促进OOD泛化未来的研究，我们还提供了一个关于数据集的综合调研，以评估学习方法在分布偏移下的表现。
The structure of this paper is organized as follows. In Section 2, we formulate the OOD generalization problem, elucidate its relationship with existing research areas, and propose a categorization of methods. Sections 3, 4, and 5 respectively detail the representative methods of each category. Section 6 offers theoretical connections and insights between different methods, while Sections 7 and 8 summarize applicable benchmarks for OOD generalization and its potential implications. Finally, we conclude this paper in Section 9, suggesting promising directions for future research.
本文的结构安排如下。在第2节中，我们构建了OOD泛化问题，阐明其与现有研究领域的联系，并提出了方法的分类。第3、4和5节分别详细介绍了每个类别的代表性方法。第6节提供了不同方法之间的理论联系和见解，而第7和8节总结了适用于OOD泛化的基准以及其潜在影响。最后，我们在第9节中总结了本文，并提出了未来研究的潜在方向。

2 Problem Definition and Categorization of Methods
2 问题定义与方法分类

In this section, we first formalize the overarching Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization problem and illustrate its similarities and differences with the classic Independent and Identically Distributed (i.i.d.) learning problem. We then proceed to explore several research domains related to OOD generalization, including Domain Adaptation, Domain Generalization, Federated Learning, and Out-of-Distribution Detection. Finally, we classify existing methodologies that address OOD generalization into distinct categories based on their respective positions within the entire learning pipeline.
在本节中，我们首先形式化了统摄性的分布外泛化问题（Out-of-Distribution，OOD），并说明了其与经典独立同分布（Independent and Identically Distributed，i.i.d.）学习问题的相似性和差异性。然后，我们探讨了与OOD泛化相关的几个研究领域，包括领域适应（Domain Adaptation）、领域泛化（Domain Generalization）、联邦学习（Federated Learning）以及分布外检测（Out-of-Distribution Detection）。最后，我们根据现有方法在完整学习管道中的各自位置，将解决OOD泛化的现有方法分类为不同的类别。

2.1 Problem Definition
2.1 问题定义

Let X be the feature space and Y the label space. A parametric model is defined as fθ:X→Y , which serves as a mapping function from original features to the label with learnable parameter θ . A loss function ℓ:Y×Y→R ,which measures the distance between predictions and ground-truth labels. The classic supervised learning problem is defined as Definition 1.
设 X 为特征空间，Y 为标签空间。一个参数化模型定义为 fθ:X→Y ，它作为从原始特征到标签的映射函数，具有可学习参数 θ 。一个损失函数 ℓ:Y×Y→R ，用于衡量预测值与真实标签之间的距离。经典监督学习问题定义为定义1。
Definition 1 (Supervised Learning). Given a set of n training samples of the form {(x1,y1),…,(xn,yn)} which are drawn from training distribution Ptr(X,Y) ,a supervised learning problem is to find an optimal model fθ∗ which can generalize best on data drawn from test distribution Pte(X,Y) :
定义1（监督学习）。给定一个由形式为 {(x1,y1),…,(xn,yn)} 的 n 个训练样本组成的集合，这些样本从训练分布 Ptr(X,Y) 中抽取，监督学习问题是要找到一个最优模型 fθ∗ ，它能在从测试分布 Pte(X,Y) 中抽取的数据上泛化得最好：
(2.1)fθ∗:=arg⁡minfθ⁡EX,Y∼Pte[ℓ(fθ(X),Y)]
Traditional learning algorithms typically assume that both the training and test samples are Independent and Identically Distributed (i.i.d.) realizations from a shared underlying distribution, namely, Ptr(X,Y)=Pte(X,Y) . Based on this assumption,the Empirical Risk Minimization (ERM) framework [250], which seeks to minimize the average loss on training samples, is capable of yielding an optimal model that successfully generalizes to test distributions [251]. Specifically, ERM seeks to minimize the following objective:
传统的学习算法通常假设训练和测试样本都是来自共享的底层分布的独立同分布（i.i.d.）实现，即 Ptr(X,Y)=Pte(X,Y) 。基于这一假设，经验风险最小化（Empirical Risk Minimization，ERM）框架[250]，旨在最小化训练样本上的平均损失，能够产生成功泛化到测试分布的最优模型[251]。具体来说，ERM寻求最小化以下目标：
(2.2)LERM(θ):=1n∑i=1n⁡ℓ(fθ(xi),yi)
The admirable properties provided by the i.i.d. assumption have served as a strong foundation for the development of numerous learning models over the past few decades.
i.i.d.假设所提供的可贵性质，几十年来一直为众多学习模型的发展提供了坚实的基础。
Out-of-Distribution Generalization Problem In real-world scenarios, the test distribution upon which a model is deployed may diverge from the training distribution [202],that is, Ptr(X,Y)≠ Pte(X,Y) . This distribution shift could be attributed to various factors,such as the temporal or spatial evolution of data, or the sample selection bias inherent in the data collection process, which render the problem more complex than the i.i.d. learning scenario. Moreover, the test distribution that one may encounter is typically unknown due to the nature of applications like stream-based online scenarios, wherein test data are generated in the future. In summary, the general Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization problem can be defined as a specific instance of the supervised learning problem wherein the test distribution Pte(X,Y) diverges from the training distribution Ptr(X,Y) and remains unknown during the training phase.
分布外泛化问题 在现实世界场景中，模型部署所依据的测试分布可能与训练分布 [202] 存在偏差，即 Ptr(X,Y)≠ Pte(X,Y) 。这种分布偏移可能归因于多种因素，例如数据的时序或空间演变，或者数据收集过程中固有的样本选择偏差，这使得问题比独立同分布（i.i.d.）学习场景更加复杂。此外，由于应用的本质，如基于流的在线场景，测试数据在未来生成，可能遇到的测试分布通常是未知的。总之，分布外（OOD）泛化问题可以定义为监督学习问题的一个特定实例，其中测试分布 Pte(X,Y) 与训练分布 Ptr(X,Y) 偏离，并在训练阶段保持未知。
There are multiple taxonomies for the OOD generalization problem [154, 223, 246, 27]. This survey primarily focuses on a popular categorization, which classifies distribution shifts as either covariate shifts (changes in the marginal distribution PX ) or concept shifts (changes in the conditional distribution PY∣X ),and provides a systematic review of various methodological approaches addressing the OOD generalization problem. Reviews of some specific distribution shifts have been developed relatively independently and can be found in well-established surveys [77, 72].
对于OOD泛化问题有多个分类法 [154, 223, 246, 27]。本调查主要关注一种流行的分类法，它将分布偏移分类为协变量偏移（边际分布 PX 的变化）或概念偏移（条件分布 PY∣X 的变化），并提供了针对OOD泛化问题的各种方法论的系统性回顾。关于某些特定的分布偏移已经相对独立地发展了一些回顾，可以在成熟的调查中找到 [77, 72]。

2.2 Categorization of Methods
2.2 方法的分类

To address the challenges posed by unknown distribution shifts, a significant number of efforts have been dedicated to out-of-distribution generalization, resulting in a vast array of relevant methods. The adopted techniques vary extensively, ranging from causality to robustness, and from structure-based to optimization-based strategies. However, to the best of our knowledge, little effort has been made to systematically and comprehensively survey these diverse methodologies within the broader context of OOD generalization, as well as elucidating the differences and interconnections between these works. In this paper, we aim to bridge this gap by reviewing the related methods of OOD generalization.
为了应对未知分布偏移带来的挑战，大量的工作致力于研究分布外泛化，产生了众多相关方法。所采用的技术范围广泛，从因果关系到鲁棒性，从基于结构的方法到基于优化的策略。然而，据我们所知，尚未有系统性和全面性的研究在OOD泛化的更广泛背景下对这些多样化的方法进行梳理，以及阐明这些工作之间的差异和联系。在本文中，我们旨在通过回顾OOD泛化相关方法来填补这一空白。
Broadly speaking, the supervised learning problem, as defined in Equation (2.1), can be divided into three relatively independent components: (1) The representation of features X (e.g., g(X) ); (2) The mapping function fθ(X) from features X (or g(X) ) to the label Y ,which is generally also known as the model or inductive bias; (3) The optimization objective. Based on this learning pipeline, we classify existing methods into three categories, according to their respective positions in the pipeline:
广义上讲，监督学习问题，如方程（2.1）所定义，可以分为三个相对独立的部分：（1）特征表示 X（例如，g(X)）；（2）从特征 X（或 g(X)）到标签 Y 的映射函数 fθ(X)，通常也被称为模型或归纳偏置；（3）优化目标。基于这个学习流程，我们根据它们在流程中的相应位置，将现有方法分为三类：
  • Unsupervised Representation Learning for OOD Generalization includes unsupervised domain generalization and disentangled representation learning, which exploit the unsupervised representation learning techniques to initialize a better representation for downstream OOD generalization tasks.
    - 分布外泛化的无监督表示学习包括无监督域泛化和解耦表示学习，它们利用无监督表示学习技术为下游OOD泛化任务初始化更好的表示。
  • Supervised Model Learning for OOD Generalization includes invariant representation learning, training strategy, causal learning, invariant risk minimization, stable Learning, and heterogeneity-aware invariant learning, which design various model architectures and learning strategies to achieve OOD generalization.
    - 分布外泛化的监督模型学习包括不变表示学习、训练策略、因果学习、不变风险最小化、稳定学习和异质性感知不变学习，它们设计了各种模型架构和学习策略以实现OOD泛化。
  • Optimization for OOD Generalization includes distributionally robust optimization and other variants, which directly formulate the objective of OOD generalization and mainly focus on robust optimization with theoretical guarantees for OOD optimality.
    - 分布外泛化的优化包括分布鲁棒优化和其他变体，它们直接构建OOD泛化的目标，并主要关注具有OOD最优性理论保证的鲁棒优化。
Within each primary category, we have established numerous sub-categories based on differing technical approaches and any additional information prerequisites.
在每个主要类别中，我们根据不同的技术方法和任何额外信息先决条件建立了许多子类别。

2.3 Discussion on Related Topics
2.3 相关话题讨论

We then discuss several research topics related to the OOD generalization problem.
然后我们讨论几个与OOD泛化问题相关的研究话题。
Domain Adaptation & Generalization A field related to OOD generalization is domain adaptation,which assumes the accessibility of the testing distribution,whether labeled Pte(X,Y) or unlabeled Pte(X) . Domain adaptation can be viewed as a particular instance of OOD generalization where there is some prior knowledge of the test distribution. Under such conditions, domain adaptation can avail itself of theoretical guarantees [17] which maintain the optimality of the trained model in test scenarios. The detailed exploration of domain adaptation methods is beyond the scope of this paper; interested readers may refer to well-established studies in this area [195,191,243,313 , 42,168] .
领域适应与泛化 领域适应是与OOD泛化相关的领域，它假设测试分布是可访问的，无论是标记的 Pte(X,Y) 还是未标记的 Pte(X) 。领域适应可以被视为OOD泛化的一个特例，其中对测试分布有一定的先验知识。在这种情况下，领域适应可以利用理论保证 [17]，这些保证维持了训练模型在测试场景中的最优性。本文范围之外是对领域适应方法的详细探讨；感兴趣的读者可以参考这一领域内已经确立的研究 [195,191,243,313 ，42,168]。
Over the past decade, domain generalization (DG), a popular branch of methodology, has rapidly garnered research attention [21]. By assuming the heterogeneity of the training data, DG methods utilize additional domain (also known as environment) labels to learn an invariant model that can generalize to unseen and shifted test data. Supported by a number of high-quality benchmarks, domain generalization studies are primarily conducted in the field of computer vision tasks. In this paper, in order to provide balanced content from various fields, we focus on the more general out-of-distribution generalization problem and only introduce a select number of typical DG methods. For a comprehensive introduction to the domain generalization problem itself, one may refer to specific DG surveys [309, 257].
在过去的十年里，领域泛化（DG），作为一种受欢迎的方法论分支，迅速获得了研究关注 [21]。通过假设训练数据具有异质性，DG方法利用额外的领域（也称为环境）标签来学习一个不变模型，该模型能够泛化到未见过的和偏移的测试数据。得益于许多高质量的基准，领域泛化研究主要在计算机视觉任务领域进行。在本文中，为了提供来自各个领域的平衡内容，我们专注于更一般的OOD泛化问题，并且只介绍了一些典型的DG方法。对于领域泛化问题本身的全面介绍，可以参考特定的DG综述 [309, 257]。
Federated learning Federated learning (FL), raised by McMahan et al. [177], addresses scenarios where multiple entities (clients) collaborate to solve a machine learning problem under the coordination of a central server or service provider [115]. Over recent years, there has been widespread interest in various aspects of FL, including communication-efficient learning, model ensemble, compression integration, system heterogeneity, data heterogeneity, personalization, and privacy. We direct readers to [115,256] for a more comprehensive survey.
联邦学习 联邦学习（FL），由McMahan等人提出[177]，解决了多个实体（客户端）在中央服务器或服务提供商的协调下合作解决机器学习问题的场景[115]。近年来，人们对FL的各个方面产生了广泛兴趣，包括通信高效学习、模型集成、压缩整合、系统异质性、数据异质性、个性化和隐私。我们指导读者参考[115,256]以获得更全面的调研。
Among these aspects, data heterogeneity is most closely related to OOD generalization problems. Both OOD and FL problems assume data heterogeneity within their training datasets. In OOD generalization problems, data heterogeneity is leveraged by models to infer invariant models. In FL, data is distributed across clients and is statistically heterogeneous as the training samples on clients may come from different distributions. Various assumptions [82,118,128,148] are made in regard to data heterogeneity to guarantee the performance of FL models, which is assessed as the expected utility across all clients. The key difference between FL and OOD lies in the mode of evaluation. In FL, while distributions on various clients differ, researchers assume that a distribution exists among the clients, and the clients in the training and test datasets are independently drawn from this distribution. Consequently,the training and test datasets are i.i.d. in a certain sense in FL. In contrast, the testing distribution in OOD generalization problems remains unknown.
在这些方面中，数据异质性与OOD泛化问题最为密切相关。OOD和FL问题都假设其训练数据集内部存在数据异质性。在OOD泛化问题中，模型利用数据异质性来推断不变模型。在FL中，数据分布在客户端，并且统计上是异质的，因为客户端上的训练样本可能来自不同的分布。关于数据异质性，人们提出了各种假设[82,118,128,148]，以保证FL模型的性能，这被评估为所有客户端的预期效用。FL与OOD之间的关键区别在于评估模式。在FL中，尽管不同客户端上的分布有所差异，研究人员假设客户端之间存在一种分布，并且训练和测试数据集中的客户端是从这个分布中独立抽取的。因此，在某种意义上，FL中的训练和测试数据集是独立同分布的。相比之下，OOD泛化问题中的测试分布是未知的。
Out-of-Distribution Detection Out-of-Distribution (OOD) detection [278], aims to identify and reject unfamiliar objects not encountered during training to ensure reliability (e.g., to forward them to experts for safe handling). Unlike OOD generalization tasks, which primarily focus on performance under distribution shifts, the OOD detection community [211, 152, 98, 244] concentrates more on detecting samples from unseen distributions. Some works in this area also pay attention to test samples with non-overlapping labels (i.e., new classes) compared to training data.
分布外检测 分布外检测（OOD）[278] 的目标是在训练期间未遇到的不熟悉对象上进行识别和拒绝，以确保可靠性（例如，将它们转发给专家进行安全处理）。与OOD泛化任务不同，后者主要关注在分布偏移下的性能，OOD检测社区[211, 152, 98, 244] 更专注于检测来自未见分布的样本。该领域的某些研究还关注与训练数据相比具有非重叠标签（即新类别）的测试样本。
Another related topic is open set classification, which aims to directly recognize unknown categories in test data [110,79] . This also differentiates from OOD generalization,where the label space is shared between the training and test data.
另一个相关的话题是开放集分类，其目标是直接识别测试数据中的未知类别 [110,79]。这也与OOD泛化不同，后者在训练和测试数据之间共享标签空间。
In the following sections, we provide a comprehensive and detailed review of OOD generalization methods corresponding to the above order and discuss their differences and theoretical connections.
在以下各节中，我们提供了对应于上述顺序的OOD泛化方法的全面和详细回顾，并讨论了它们之间的差异和理论联系。

3 Unsupervised Representation Learning
3 无监督表征学习

In this section, we review methods that concentrate on unsupervised representation learning, which primarily include unsupervised domain generalization and disentangled representation learning. These methods either independently learn domain-agnostic features, or they employ pre-existing human knowledge to structure and regulate the representation learning process. By doing so, they ensure that the learned representation possesses certain attributes that may facilitate out-of-distribution generalization.
在本节中，我们回顾了专注于无监督表征学习的方法，主要包括无监督域泛化和解耦表征学习。这些方法要么独立学习域无关特征，要么利用现有的人类知识来构建和规范表征学习过程。通过这样做，它们确保学到的表征具有某些属性，这些属性可能有助于分布外的泛化。

3.1 Unsupervised Domain Generalization
3.1 无监督域泛化

Learning a discriminative and robust representation across diverse distributions, particularly with limited labeled data, can serve as the foundation for out-of-distribution (OOD) generalization ability [173,301] . Prior to this,the issue of initializing pre-trained weights for OOD generalization has remained a crucial but often overlooked aspect. In the realm of computer vision, it is conventional to initialize with ImageNet pre-trained weights for OOD generalization. However, this can introduce significant bias. For instance, the "real" domain in DomainNet [304] and the "photo" domain in PACS [143] share a similar distribution with ImageNet, while other domains exhibit distinct shifts. Consequently, such initialization can be viewed as pretraining on one of the source domains. Furthermore, for datasets like NICO++ [94, 299], where image contexts are deemed as domains, ImageNet provides additional knowledge of numerous contexts which could lead to the leakage of test domains [290].
在不同分布上学习具有区分性和鲁棒性的表示，尤其是在有限标注数据的情况下，可以作为分布外泛化能力 [173,301] 的基础。在此之前，初始化预训练权重以实现分布外泛化的问题一直是一个关键但常被忽视的方面。在计算机视觉领域，通常使用 ImageNet 预训练权重来初始化分布外泛化。然而，这可能会引入显著的偏差。例如，DomainNet [304] 中的 "real" 领域和 PACS [143] 中的 "photo" 领域与 ImageNet 具有相似的分布，而其他领域则表现出不同的偏移。因此，这种初始化可以被视为在某个源领域上进行预训练。此外，对于像 NICO++ [94, 299] 这样的数据集，其中图像上下文被视为领域，ImageNet 提供了关于许多上下文的知识，这可能导致测试领域的泄露 [290]。
Addressing these challenges, Mahajan et al. [173] and Zhang et al. [301] introduce the concept of unsupervised domain generalization (UDG). This approach aims to learn generalizable models using unlabeled data, while simultaneously analyzing the effects of pre-training on OOD generalization. Recently, numerous self-supervised learning methods have shown promising results, using large-scale unlabeled data to learn potent representation spaces [34,92,32,84] . However,these methods cannot directly tackle the OOD generalization problem, as the learned representation space contains domain-specific features used to discriminate negative samples. These features can be unhelpful or even detrimental to downstream tasks [298].
为了应对这些挑战，Mahajan 等人 [173] 和 Zhang 等人 [301] 引入了无监督领域泛化（UDG）的概念。这种方法旨在使用未标注数据学习泛化模型，同时分析预训练对分布外泛化的影响。最近，许多自监督学习方法已经显示出有希望的结果，它们使用大规模未标注数据来学习强大的表示空间 [34,92,32,84]。然而，这些方法不能直接解决分布外泛化问题，因为学习到的表示空间包含了用于区分负样本的领域特定特征。这些特征对于下游任务可能无用甚至有害 [298]。
To address this, Zhang et al. [301] propose DARLING, a method that outperforms the ImageNet pre-trained approach using significantly less unlabeled data. This indicates a promising direction for model initialization for OOD generalization. In follow-up work, Harary et al. [88] suggest learning an auxiliary bridge domain along with a set of mappings from training domains to semantically align all domains. Another work [276] utilizes Masked Auto-Encoders [93] to further enhance unsupervised representation learning. Other studies [153,310] also discuss semi-supervised learning approaches for the OOD generalization problem.
为了解决这个问题，张等人 [301] 提出了DARLING方法，该方法在显著较少的无标签数据上优于ImageNet预训练方法。这表明了模型初始化用于OOD泛化的一个有希望的方向。在后续工作中，Harary等人 [88] 建议在学习辅助桥接域的同时，学习一组从训练域到语义对齐所有域的映射。另一项工作 [276] 利用Masked Auto-Encoders [93] 进一步增强无监督表示学习。其他研究 [153,310] 也讨论了针对OOD泛化问题的半监督学习方法。

3.2 Disentangled Representation Learning
3.2 解耦表示学习

Disentangled representation learning aims to learn representations where distinct and informative factors of data variation are separated [18,166] . This is considered a characteristic of high-quality representation and can potentially benefit out-of-distribution generalization. The most prevalent methods for achieving disentanglement are based on Variational Autoencoders (VAE [101, 121]). These are implemented in an entirely unsupervised manner within a single environment, without additional information. These methods prioritize both interpretability and sparsity. Here, sparsity refers to the idea that small changes in distribution typically manifest in a sparse or localized manner within the disentangled factorization [224].
解耦表示学习的目标是学习表示，其中数据变化的独立且信息量大的因素被分离 [18,166]。这被认为是高质量表示的特征，并且可能有助于分布外泛化。实现解耦的最常见方法是基于变分自编码器（VAE [101, 121]）。这些方法在单个环境中完全以无监督的方式实施，无需额外信息。这些方法优先考虑解释性和稀疏性。在这里，稀疏性指的是分布的小变化通常在解耦因式分解中以稀疏或局部化的方式表现 [224]。
No Additional Information β -VAE [101] introduces an extra hyperparameter β into vanilla VAE objective function, making a trade-off between latent bottleneck capacity and independence constraints, thus encouraging the model to learn more efficient representations. The objective function of β -VAE is as follows:
无额外信息 β -VAE [101] 在标准VAE目标函数中引入了一个额外的超参数 β，在潜在瓶颈容量和独立性约束之间做出权衡，从而鼓励模型学习更有效的表示。 β -VAE的目标函数如下：
(3.1)L=Eq(z∣x)[log⁡p(x∣z)]−βKL(q(z∣x)∥p(z))
where z represents the latent representation, x denotes the observed data, p(z) symbolizes the prior distribution of latent factors, p(x∣z) indicates the decoding distribution,and q(z∣x) is the encoding posterior distribution. When β is set to 1.0,this formulation reduces to vanilla VAE. By appropriately tuning β ,the β -VAE can learn disentangled representations from data in an unsupervised manner.
其中 z 表示潜在表示，x 表示观测数据，p(z) 符号表示潜在因子的先验分布，p(x∣z) 表示解码分布，q(z∣x) 是编码后验分布。当 β 设为 1.0 时，该公式简化为标准变分自编码器（vanilla VAE）。通过适当调整 β，β-VAE 可以以无监督的方式从数据中学习到解耦表示。
FactorVAE [121] adds the term of Total Correlation into the objective function, which is formulated as the KL-divergence between marginal posterior q(z) and its corresponding factorized distribution q¯(z) :
FactorVAE [121] 将总相关性（Total Correlation）项加入到目标函数中，其形式化为边际后验 q(z) 与其对应的分解分布 q¯(z) 之间的KL散度：
(3.2)L=Eq(z∣x)[log⁡p(x∣z)]−KL(q(z∣x)∥p(z))−γKL(q(z)∥q¯(z))
where q¯(z):=∏j=1d⁡q(zj) . This formulation encourages independence for the posterior latent representation. Since the Total Correlation term cannot be computed directly, an extra discriminator is added for density ratio estimation.
其中 q¯(z):=∏j=1d⁡q(zj)。这种形式鼓励后验潜在表示的独立性。由于总相关性项不能直接计算，因此增加了一个额外的判别器用于密度比估计。
More recently, despite the popularity of VAE-based methods without contextual information, Locatello et al. [166] challenge some common assumptions of unsupervised disentangled representation learning (e.g., independence of latent factors). This brings back the need for additional information to the attention of researchers. It also questions whether disentanglement can improve downstream task performances, inspiring later works to take downstream tasks into consideration, OOD generalization performance included.
更近期，尽管基于VAE且不包含上下文信息的方法很受欢迎，Locatello等人[166] 对无监督解耦表示学习（例如，潜在因子的独立性）的一些常见假设提出了质疑。这重新引起了研究者对于额外信息需求的关注。它还质疑解耦是否可以提高下游任务的性能，激发后续工作考虑将下游任务包括在内的OOD泛化性能。
Among these works, a new category of disentangled representation learning arises, i.e. causal representation learning. Similar to conventional disentangled representation learning, causal representation learning aims to learn variables in the causal graph with the aid of auxiliary annotations. Further, causal representation can be viewed as the ultimate goal of disentanglement, which satisfies the informal definition of disentangled representation in terms of interpretability and sparsity. With the learned causal representation, one can capture the latent data generation process, which can help to resist the distributional shifts induced by interventions.
在这些工作中，出现了一种新的解耦表示学习类别，即因果表示学习。与传统的解耦表示学习相似，因果表示学习旨在在辅助注释的帮助下学习因果图中的变量。进一步地，因果表示可以被视为解耦的最终目标，它在解释性和稀疏性方面满足解耦表示的非正式定义。通过学习到的因果表示，可以捕捉潜在的数据生成过程，这有助于抵抗由干预引起的分布偏移。
CausalVAE [281] combines the linear Structural Causal Model (SCM) into the VAE model to endow the learned latent representation with causal structure. Specifically, the causal structure is depicted by an adjacency matrix A as:
CausalVAE [281] 将线性结构因果模型（SCM）结合到VAE模型中，使学到的潜在表征具有因果结构。具体来说，因果结构由邻接矩阵 A 描述如下：
(3.3)z=ATz+ϵ=(I−AT)−1ϵ,ϵ∼N(0,I)
where ϵ represents the exogenous factors. In practice,a mild nonlinear function gi is introduced for stability as zi=gi(Ai⋅z;ηi)+ϵi . Further,extra labels u of latent causal variables are leveraged in CausalVAE, which gives the objective function as:
其中 ϵ 代表外生因素。在实际应用中，为了稳定性引入了轻微的非线性函数 gi ，如 zi=gi(Ai⋅z;ηi)+ϵi 所示。此外，CausalVAE利用了潜在因果变量的额外标签 u，目标函数表示为：
(3.4)L=−ELBO+αDAG(A)+βlu+γlm
where ELBO represents the Evidence Lower Bound, DAG(A) the Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) constraint, lu=EqX‖u−σ(ATu)‖22 measures how well A describes causal relations among labels, and lm=Ez∼qϕ∑i=1n⁡‖zi−gi(Ai⋅z;ηi)‖22 measures how well A describes causal relations among latent codes. qX is the empirical data distribution and qϕ the approximate posterior distribution.
其中ELBO代表证据下界，DAG(A)代表有向无环图（DAG）约束，lu=EqX‖u−σ(ATu)‖22衡量A描述标签间因果关系的程度，lm=Ez∼qϕ∑i=1n⁡‖zi−gi(Ai⋅z;ηi)‖22衡量A描述潜在码之间因果关系的程度。qX是经验数据分布，qϕ是近似后验分布。
Moving a step on, DEAR [233] incorporates nonlinear SCM with a bidirectional generative model and assumes the known causal graph structure and extra supervised information of latent factors. The objective function is given as:
进一步地，DEAR [233] 将非线性SCM与双向生成模型相结合，并假设已知的因果图结构和潜在因子的额外监督信息。目标函数表示为：
(3.5)L(E,G,F)=Lgen (E,G,F)+Lsup (E)
where E,G denotes the encoder and generator,respectively. The first part Lgen (E,G,F)= KL(qE(x,z),pG,F(x,z)) resembles the VAE loss. The difference lies in the prior distribution of z . In DEAR,this prior is generated by the nonlinear SCM,while in vanilla VAE,it is simply a factorized Gaussian. The second part is Lsup(E)=Ex,yCE(E¯(x),u) ,where CE is the cross entropy loss function, E¯ represents the deterministic part of E and u the extra labels.
其中E,G分别表示编码器和解码器。Lgen (E,G,F)=KL(qE(x,z),pG,F(x,z))的第一部分类似于VAE损失。不同之处在于z的先验分布。在DEAR中，这个先验由非线性SCM生成，而在标准VAE中，它仅仅是一个分解的高斯分布。第二部分是Lsup(E)=Ex,yCE(E¯(x),u)，其中CE代表交叉熵损失函数，E¯表示E的确定性部分，u表示额外标签。
Require Additional Information Apart from these fully unsupervised disentangled representation learning methods, there are works utilizing additional information toward disentanglement. The additional information, in the broad sense, includes not only environment labels or domain labels but also auxiliary annotations such as additional information related to latent causal variables. Reed et al. [210] propose disentangling Boltzmann machines by incorporating partial labels to construct corresponding data pairs. Zhu et al. [312] and Yang et al. [277] both explicitly take ground truth transformed images and transformations as auxiliary signals. The former is based on a directed graphical model optimized in a style of EM algorithm, while the latter employs RNN to capture longer-term dependency for multiple transformation steps, inspired by mental experiments on human beings. Meanwhile, Kulkarni et al. [134] implicitly take advantage of contextual information by enforcing specific latent variables held fixed, leaving only other properties varying in a single training batch. Recently, Zhang et al. [296] propose a primal-dual algorithm for joint representation disentanglement and domain generalization, which shows the potential of disentanglement to enhance generalization ability.
除了这些完全无监督的解耦表示学习方法外，还有一些工作利用额外信息来实现解耦。从广义上讲，额外信息不仅包括环境标签或领域标签，还包括辅助注释，例如与潜在因果变量相关的额外信息。Reed等人[210]提出通过结合部分标签构建相应的数据对来解耦玻尔兹曼机。Zhu等人[312]和Yang等人[277]都明确地将地面真实转换图像和转换作为辅助信号。前者基于一种有向图模型，在EM算法的风格中优化，而后者采用RNN来捕捉多个转换步骤的长期依赖关系，这是受到对人类心理实验的启发。同时，Kulkarni等人[134]通过强制特定的潜在变量保持固定，仅在其他属性在单个训练批次中变化，隐式地利用了上下文信息。最近，Zhang等人[296]提出了一种原-对偶算法，用于联合表示解耦和领域泛化，这显示了解耦增强泛化能力的潜力。
In addition to the above disentangled representation learning methods, with or without additional information, there exist discussions and explorations on how disentangled representation can benefit OOD generalization. Leeb et al. [139] take advantage of causal ordering information and conduct some quantitative extrapolation experiments, finding that the learned disentangled representation fails to extrapolate to unseen data, while Träuble et al. [247] and Dittadi et al. [49] empirically verify the ability to generalize under OOD circumstances. Reddy et al. [209] propose to utilize bounding box information to achieve disentanglement and come up with a new dataset CANDLE that can be applied in multiple settings including OOD generalization tasks. Lachapelle et al. [135] prove that disentangled representations incorporated with sparse task-specific predictors could improve generalization. Overall, the advantage of disentangled representation on OOD generalization still requires further in-depth research and discussion.
除了上述的解耦表示学习方法和是否带有额外信息的情况外，还有关于解耦表示如何有利于OOD泛化的讨论和探索。Leeb等人[139]利用因果顺序信息并进行了一些定量外推实验，发现学到的解耦表示无法推广到未见过的数据，而Träuble等人[247]和Dittadi等人[49]经验性地验证了在OOD情况下进行泛化的能力。Reddy等人[209]提出利用边界框信息来实现解耦，并提出了一个新的数据集CANDLE，可以应用于包括OOD泛化任务在内的多种设置。Lachapelle等人[135]证明了将解耦表示与稀疏任务特定预测器结合可以提高泛化能力。总的来说，解耦表示在OOD泛化方面的优势仍需进一步深入研究和讨论。

4 Supervised Model Learning for OOD Generalization
4 监督模型学习用于OOD泛化

Aside from the solely unsupervised learning of representations, there are a multitude of studies that incorporate supervised information (labels) to devise different model architectures and learning strategies. These methods place emphasis on end-to-end model learning to enhance their performance in OOD generalization. Given the vast range of literature in this field, we further categorize these methods based on their additional information requirements. This categorization facilitates a fairer and more comprehensible comparison of the various approaches.
除去仅有的无监督表示学习，还有大量研究结合了监督信息（标签）来设计不同的模型架构和学习策略。这些方法强调端到端的模型学习，以提高OOD泛化的性能。鉴于这一领域文献的广泛范围，我们进一步根据它们对额外信息的需求对这些方法进行分类。这种分类促进了对各种方法的更公平和更易于理解的比较。

4.1 Require Environment Labels
4.1 需要环境标签

Numerous existing methods strive to exploit explicit environment labels to improve OOD generalization. Notably, these approaches encompass causal learning, invariant learning, and a variety of training strategies. In this section, we encapsulate the fundamental concepts underlying these techniques.
许多现有方法努力利用显式的环境标签来改善OOD泛化。值得注意的是，这些方法包括因果学习、不变性学习和各种训练策略。在本节中，我们概括了这些技术背后的基本概念。
Causal Learning Causal learning methods aim to learn the underlying causal structure of the data and to predict the outcome variable based on the identified causal variables. By correctly identifying the cause-effect relationships, these methods are expected to perform well even when the data distribution changes, as the underlying causal structure is often assumed to remain invariant across different environments or domains.
因果学习 因果学习方法旨在学习数据背后的因果结构，并根据识别出的因果变量预测结果变量。通过正确识别因果关系的变量，这些方法预计在数据分布变化时也能表现良好，因为通常假设因果结构在不同环境或领域中保持不变。
Invariant Learning Invariant learning methods aim to learn features or representations that are invariant across different environments. The idea is that by focusing on the aspects of the data that do not change across environments, models could generalize better to new, unseen environments.
不变性学习 不变性学习方法旨在学习跨不同环境保持不变的特征或表示。这种方法的核心思想是关注数据中跨环境不变的方面，从而使模型能够更好地泛化到新的、未见过的环境。
Training Strategies Certain training strategies also utilize explicit environment labels to improve generalization. These methods often involve training models in a way that explicitly takes into account the potential differences between environments. For example, some methods might involve training separate models for each environment or explicitly modeling the differences between environments.
训练策略 某些训练策略也利用显式环境标签来提高泛化能力。这些方法通常涉及以明确考虑环境之间潜在差异的方式训练模型。例如，某些方法可能包括为每个环境单独训练模型，或明确建模环境之间的差异。

4.1.1 Causal Learning
4.1.1 因果学习

Causal learning, rooted in the causal inference literature, provides a principled approach to the problem of OOD generalization. Its primary goal is to leverage causal variables for predictions, making it increasingly practical in recent times. We start with an introduction to the foundational concepts of causal learning, followed by an exploration of various related studies.
因果学习，源于因果推断文献，为处理OOD泛化问题提供了一个原则性的方法。其主要目标是利用因果变量进行预测，近年来在实际应用中越来越实用。我们从介绍因果学习的基本概念开始，然后探讨各种相关研究。
The underlying assumption of causal learning is captured in Assumption A, which originates in the causal inference literature. It postulates the existence of a causally invariant relationship between the target variable Y and its direct causes Xpa(Y) . This assumption implies that causal variables Xpa(Y) remain stable across different environments or despite biases in data selection. This stability has driven a range of studies aimed at achieving OOD generalization through the exclusive exploitation of causal variables.
因果学习的基本假设体现在假设A中，该假设源于因果推断文献。它假设目标变量 Y 与其直接原因 Xpa(Y) 之间存在因果不变的关系。这个假设意味着因果变量 Xpa(Y) 在不同环境中或尽管数据选择存在偏差时保持稳定。这种稳定性激发了一系列研究，旨在通过专门利用因果变量来实现OOD泛化。
Assumption A (Causality Assumption [26]). The structural equation models:
假设A（因果假设 [26]）。结构方程模型：
(4.1)Ye←fY(Xpa(Y)e,ϵYe),ϵYe⊥Xpa(Y)e
remains the same across all environments e∈supp(Eall ) ,that is, ϵYe has the same distribution as ϵY for all environments. pa(Y) denotes the direct causes of Y .
在所有环境中保持不变 e∈supp(Eall ) ，即 ϵYe 的分布与 ϵY 在所有环境中相同 pa(Y) 表示 Y 的直接原因。
Next, we explore methods related to causal inference, which endeavor to extract causal variables from heterogeneous data. It's common knowledge that the gold standard for identifying the causal effect of a variable is to carry out randomized experiments,like A/B testing. However,these full-scale randomized experiments can be prohibitively expensive and often impractical in real-world applications. The ambitious nature of causal inference or causal structure learning makes these techniques more of an ideal "ground truth" rather than a practically achievable goal in typical machine learning settings.
接下来，我们探讨与因果推断相关的方法，这些方法试图从异质数据中提取因果变量。众所周知，确定变量因果效应的金标准是进行随机化实验，如A/B测试。然而，在实际应用中，这些大规模的随机化实验可能成本高昂且往往不切实际。因果推断或因果结构学习的雄心勃勃的本质使得这些技术更像是典型的机器学习环境中理想化的“地面真相”，而不是实际可达到的目标。
Therefore, it is more pragmatic to design techniques that provide a more "causal explanation" compared to the standard regression or classification framework, while also offering a degree of invariance across environments. Following this intuition, a series of methods [200, 201, 218, 96, 73, 189] have been proposed, leveraging the inherent heterogeneity within data (e.g., across multiple environments).
因此，设计提供比标准回归或分类框架更多“因果解释”的技术更为实用，同时还能在环境间提供一定程度的不变性。遵循这种直觉，已经提出了一系列方法 [200, 201, 218, 96, 73, 189]，利用数据内固有的异质性（例如，跨多个环境）。
Assumption B (Invariance Assumption). There exists a subset S∗⊆{1,…,p} of the covariate indices (including the empty set) such that
假设B（不变性假设）。存在一个协变量指标子集 S∗⊆{1,…,p}（包括空集），使得
(4.2)P(Ye∣XS∗e)is the same for alle∈E.
That is,when conditioning on the covariates from S∗ (denoted by XS∗e ),the conditional distribution is invariant across all environments from E .
即，当在 S∗ 中的协变量（表示为 XS∗e ）条件下，条件分布 E 在所有环境中是不变的。
Peters et al. [200] first try to investigate the fact that "invariance" could, to some extent, infer the causal structure under necessary conditions and propose Invariant Causal Prediction (ICP). Specifically, they leverage the fact that when considering all direct causes of a target variable, the conditional distribution of the target given the direct causes will not change when interfering all other variables in the model except the target itself. Then they perform a statistical test whether a subset of covariates S satisfies the invariance assumption B for the observed environments in E . The null hypothesis for testing is:
Peters等人[200]首次尝试研究“不变性”在一定程度上可以推断在必要条件下因果结构的事实，并提出了不变因果预测（ICP）。具体来说，他们利用了这样一个事实：当考虑目标变量的所有直接原因时，给定直接原因的目标变量的条件分布在干扰模型中除目标本身以外的所有其他变量时不会改变。然后他们对一组协变量 S 是否满足 E 中观察到的环境的不变性假设B进行统计检验。检验的零假设是：
H0,S(E): invariance assumption holds.
and all subsets of covariates S which lead to invariance are intersected,that is:
所有导致不变性的协变量子集 S 相交，即：
S^(E)=⋂S⁡{S;H0,S(E) not rejected by test at significance level α}.
Under the assumption of structural equation model and Gaussian residual described in [200], ICP with Chow test [39] could,at least with controllable probability 1−α ,discover subsets of true causal variables, which reads as:
在[200]中描述的结构方程模型和高斯残差的假设下，ICP结合Chow检验[39]至少在可控概率 1−α 下，可以发掘真正的因果变量子集，其表述为：
(4.3)P[S^(E)⊆pa(Y)]≥1−α
where pa(Y) denotes the direct causes of target Y (e.g. the parental variables of Y in the causal graph). Though being the first attempt to connect invariance with causality, ICP has several limitations. The most straightforward one is the strict requirements for heterogeneity since the power of ICP depends highly on the quality of available environments Etr (or perturbations). If the available perturbed subpopulations are not enough, or even a single environment, the efficacy of ICP will be lost. As discussed in [201], naively estimating the environments from data and then applying ICP may yield less powerful results, so instead of using static data, Pfister et al. [201] propose to leverage the sequential data from a non-stationary environment to detect instantaneous causal relations in multivariate linear time series, which relaxes the assumption of known environments. Besides environmental specification, there are other works trying to consolidate the coverage of the so-called invariance-based method. For example, Heinze-Deml et al. [96] extend the ICP into non-linear model and continuous environments; Gamella and Heinze-Deml [73] apply the ICP into an active learning setting where the interventions (a.k.a. environments) can be proactively chosen during training.
其中 pa(Y) 表示目标 Y 的直接原因（例如因果图中的 Y 的父母变量）。尽管 ICP 是首次尝试将不变性与因果性联系起来，但它有几个局限性。最直接的一个是对异质性的严格要求，因为 ICP 的能力高度依赖于可用环境 Etr（或扰动）的质量。如果可用的扰动子群体不足，甚至只有一个环境，ICP 的有效性将丧失。如 [201] 中讨论的那样，简单地从数据中估计环境然后应用 ICP 可能会产生较弱的结果，因此，Pfister 等人 [201] 提出利用来自非定常环境的顺序数据来检测多变量线性时间序列中的瞬时因果关系，这放宽了已知环境的假设。除了环境规范之外，还有其他工作试图巩固所谓的基于不变性的方法的覆盖范围。例如，Heinze-Deml 等人 [96] 将 ICP 扩展到非线性模型和连续环境；Gamella 和 Heinze-Deml [73] 将 ICP 应用于主动学习设置，其中干预（即环境）可以在训练过程中主动选择。
ICP serves as a milestone towards inferring causal structure via invariance property. However, the invariance assumption may be violated in more complicated scenarios. Among which, the most common case is the existence of hidden confounders. The instrument variable(IV) method is one typical method for dealing with hidden confounders,which requires the instrument variable E not to directly act on the hidden confounding variable H and outcome variable Y ,as shown in Figure 1a.
ICP 作为通过不变性属性推断因果结构的里程碑。然而，在更复杂的场景中，不变性假设可能会被违反。其中，最常见的情况是存在隐藏的混杂因子。工具变量（IV）方法是处理隐藏混杂因子的典型方法，它要求工具变量 E 不直接作用于隐藏的混杂变量 H 和结果变量 Y，如图 1a 所示。
Figure 1: Comparision of SCM between IV model and Anchor Regression model.
图 1：IV 模型与锚点回归模型之间的 SCM 比较。
Rothenhäusler et al. [218] investigate more relaxed conditions than the standard IV model which allow the direct effect of instrument variable (which they called anchor variables) on H and Y ,as shown in Figure 1b. They realize that despite the attractive notion of invariance guarantee against arbitrarily large intervention or perturbation, one seldom encounters such extreme cases, and exact invariance could be too conservative for moderately perturbed data. Specifically, they focus on the following structural equation:
Rothenhäusler等人[218]研究了一种比标准工具变量模型更为宽松的条件，该条件允许工具变量（他们称之为锚变量）对 H 和 Y 产生直接效应，如图1b所示。他们意识到，尽管不变性概念具有对抗任意大的干预或扰动的吸引力，但很少遇到此类极端情况，且对于中度扰动的数据，精确不变性可能过于保守。具体来说，他们关注以下结构方程：
(4.4)Y=XTβ+HTα+ATξ+ϵY
with X∈Rp,H∈Rq and A∈Rr ,and proposed a regularized formulation of ordinary least squares model by the error projection to the space spanned by anchor variables.
在 X∈Rp,H∈Rq 和 A∈Rr 的条件下，通过误差投影到锚变量张成的空间，提出了普通最小二乘模型的正则化形式。
(4.5)β^(γ)=arg⁡minb⁡(‖(I−ΠA)(Y−Xb)‖22/n+γ‖ΠA(Y−Xb)‖22/n).
where ΠA denotes the projection in Rn onto the column space of A . For γ=1,β^(1) equals the ordinary least squares estimator,for γ→∞ it obtains the two-stage least squares procedure from IV regression.
其中 ΠA 表示 Rn 在 A 列空间上的投影。对于 γ=1,β^(1) 等于普通最小二乘估计量，对于 γ→∞ 它从工具变量回归中获得了两阶段最小二乘过程。
When the observation of instrument A is still hard to fulfill,Oberst et al. [189] further relax the assumption by introducing the noisy proxy of A and prove the robustness of the method under bounded shifts. Based on these, Mazaheri et al. [176] focus on the setting where the causal and anti-causal variables of the outcome variable are unobserved and propose feature selection and engineering methods to identify proxies.
当观测到的工具 A 仍然难以满足时，Oberst等人[189]通过引入 A 的噪声代理并证明了方法在界限移位下的鲁棒性，进一步放宽了假设。基于这些，Mazaheri等人[176]关注于结果变量的因果变量和逆因果变量未观测到的设置，并提出了特征选择和工程方法来识别代理。

4.1.2 Invariant Learning
4.1.2 不变性学习

Relaxing the causality to invariance, the key idea of invariant learning is to learn an invariant representation or model across environments leveraging contextual information such as domain labels. There are works [181,11,6] that theoretically or empirically prove that if the representations remain invariant when the domain varies, the representations are transferable and robust on different domains. Methods that seek invariance among different environments can be mainly divided into three categories, namely invariant risk minimization and domain-irrelevant representation learning.
将因果性放宽到不变性，不变性学习的关键思想是利用上下文信息（如领域标签）跨环境学习不变表示或模型。有一些工作[181,11,6]从理论或实证上证明了如果表示在领域变化时保持不变，那么这些表示在不同领域上是可迁移和鲁棒的。寻求在不同环境中不变性的方法主要可以分为三类，即不变风险最小化和与领域无关的表示学习。
Invariant Risk Minimization Deriving from causal inference, invariant risk minimization (IRM, [11]), targets on latent causal mechanisms and extends ICP to more practical and general settings. Different from causal learning methods that act on raw variable level, IRM makes the invariance assumption as:
从因果推断中衍生出的不变风险最小化（IRM，[11]），目标是对潜在因果机制进行优化，并将ICP扩展到更实用和一般性的场景。与在原始变量级别上作用的因果学习方法不同，IRM将不变性假设作为：
Assumption C (IRM’s Invariance Assumption). There exists data representation Φ(X) such that for all e,e′∈supp(Etr),E[Y∣Φ(Xe)]=E[Y∣Φ(Xe′)] ,where Etr denotes the available training environments.
假设C（IRM的不变性假设）。存在数据表示 Φ(X) ，使得对于所有 e,e′∈supp(Etr),E[Y∣Φ(Xe)]=E[Y∣Φ(Xe′)] ，其中 Etr 表示可用的训练环境。
Arjovsky et al. [11] propose to find data representation Φ(X) that can both predict well and elicit an invariant linear predictor w across Etr ,which results in the following objective function:
Arjovsky等人[11]提出寻找数据表示 Φ(X) ，这种表示既可以很好地预测，又能在 Etr 上引发不变线性预测器 w ，这导致了以下目标函数：
(4.6)minΦ(X),w⁡∑e∈supp(Etr)⁡Le(w⊙Φ(X),Y)
(4.7)s.t.w∈arg⁡minw¯⁡Le(w¯⊙Φ(X)),for alle∈supp(Etr)
In order to achieve invariance across Eall by enforcing low error of Equation (4.6) on Etr ,IRM requires sufficient diversity across environments and makes the following assumption.
为了通过在 Etr 上强制方程（4.6）的低误差来实现跨 Eall 的不变性，IRM要求环境之间有足够的多样性，并做出以下假设。
Assumption D (IRM’s Condition,Assumption 8 in [11]). A set of training environments Etr lie in linear general position of degree r if |Etr|>d−r+dr for some r∈N ,and for all non-zero x∈Rd :
假设D（IRM的条件，[11]中的假设8）。一组训练环境 Etr 处于 r 度的线性一般位置，如果 |Etr|>d−r+dr 对于某些 r∈N 成立，且对于所有非零 x∈Rd 成立：
(4.8)dim⁡(span({EXe[XeXeT]x−EXe,ϵe[Xeϵe]}e∈Etr))>d−r
With Assumption D,IRM characterizes under what conditions an invariant predictor w∘Φ(X) across Etr remains invariant across Eall  in linear cases (Therorem 9 in [11]). It makes the same assumptions about linearity,centered noise,and independence between the noise ϵe and the causal variables as ICP [200], but does not assume that the data is Gaussian, the existence of a causal graph, or that the training environments arise from specific types of interventions. And the result of IRM could extend to latent causal variables while ICP [200] restricts to raw causal feature level.
在假设D下，IRM描述了在什么条件下，跨 Etr 的不变预测器 w∘Φ(X) 在线性情况下跨 Eall  保持不变（[11]中的定理9）。它对线性、中心噪声以及噪声 ϵe 与因果变量之间的独立性做出与ICP [200] 相同的假设，但不假设数据是高斯分布的，不存在因果图，或者训练环境来源于特定类型的干预。IRM的结果可以扩展到潜在因果变量，而ICP [200] 仅限于原始因果特征级别。
Based on IRM, follow-up works have proposed variations on this objective with similar regulariza-tions of the invariance assumption C ,resulting in similar alternatives. Chang et al. [30] and Koyama
基于IRM，后续工作提出了在这个目标上的变体，具有类似的不变性假设正则化 C，导致了类似的替代方案。Chang等人[30]和Koyama
and Yamaguchi [129] formulate the desired invariant representation using information theory, and propose to find the maximal invariant predictor (MIP) across training environments. The maximal invariant predictor is defined as:
以及Yamaguchi [129] 使用信息理论来构建期望的不变表示，并提出了在训练环境中寻找最大不变预测器（MIP）。最大不变预测器被定义为：
Definition 2. The invariance set I with respect to E is defined as:
定义2。关于 E 的不变性集合 I 被定义为：
(4.9)IE={Φ(X):Y⊥E∣Φ(X)}={Φ(X):H[Y∣Φ(X)]=H[Y∣Φ(X),E]}
where H[⋅] is the Shannon entropy of a random variable. The corresponding maximal invariant predictor (MIP) of IE is defined as:
其中 H[⋅] 是随机变量的Shannon熵。相应地，关于 IE 的最大不变预测器（MIP）被定义为：
(4.10)SE=arg⁡maxΦ∈IE⁡I(Y;Φ)
where I(⋅;⋅) measures Shannon mutual information between two random variables.
其中 I(⋅;⋅) 衡量两个随机变量之间的Shannon互信息。
With the invariant predictor SEall  ,Koyama and Yamaguchi [129] prove that the OOD optimal model is given by E[Y∣SEall] . Further,to obtain the MIP solution from training environments Etr , Koyama and Yamaguchi [129] derive a regularizer as:
使用不变预测器 SEall ，Koyama和Yamaguchi [129] 证明了OOD最优模型由 E[Y∣SEall] 给出。进一步地，为了从训练环境 Etr 中获得MIP解，Koyama和Yamaguchi [129] 推导出一个正则化器如下：
(4.11)Trace(Vare∈Etr(∇θLe(θ)))
where the variance is taken with respect to training environments Etr . Under the controllability condition proposed by Koyama and Yamaguchi [129] which assumes that there exists an environment e such that X⊥Y∣Φ(X),e ,the optimality of E[Y∣Φ(X)] can be verified,as shown in Proposition 3.1 in [129] and Theorem 1 in [215].
其中方差是针对训练环境 Etr 来计算的。在Koyama和Yamaguchi [129] 提出的可控性条件下，假设存在一个环境 e 使得 X⊥Y∣Φ(X),e，E[Y∣Φ(X)] 的最优性可以得到验证，正如[129]中的命题3.1和[215]中的定理1所示。
Moreover, Ahuja et al. [4] introduce game theory to this field and substitute the linear classifier in IRM with an ensemble of classifiers originating from different environments. Jin et al. [113] replace IRM’s regularizer with predictive regret,imposing more stringent constraints on Φ(X) . Krueger et al. [130] propose penalizing the variance of risks across different environments, while Xie et al. [265] suggest a similar objective but swap the original penalty with the square root of the variance. Mahajan et al. [173] present a contrastive regularizer that matches the representation of identical objects across different environments. Creager et al. [41] focus on IRM's issue of missing environment labels and put forward Environment Inference for Invariant Learning (EIIL) to maximize IRM's penalty by learning environments. This two-stage algorithm first generates environments based on a biased reference model, then carries out invariant learning using the environments learned. Xin et al. [266] elucidate the link between invariant learning and adversarial training for OOD generalization and introduce an adversarial training method to mitigate distribution shifts. Fan et al. [64] examine the invariant learning problem from a statistical perspective and propose an environment-invariant linear least squares objective function. And Li et al. [142] suggest an invariant information bottleneck to extract invariant representations via mutual information.
此外，Ahuja等人[4]将博弈论引入该领域，并将IRM中的线性分类器替换为来自不同环境的分类器组合。Jin等人[113]将IRM的正则化项替换为预测遗憾，对 Φ(X) 施加了更严格的约束。Krueger等人[130]提出对跨不同环境的风险的方差进行惩罚，而Xie等人[265]提出了一个类似的目标函数，但将原始惩罚替换为方差的平方根。Mahajan等人[173]提出了一种对比正则化项，它匹配不同环境中相同对象的表示。Creager等人[41]关注于IRM缺失环境标签的问题，并提出了用于不变学习的环境推断（EIIL），通过学习环境来最大化IRM的惩罚。这个两阶段算法首先基于有偏参考模型生成环境，然后使用学到的环境进行不变学习。Xin等人[266]阐明了不变学习与OOD泛化对抗训练之间的联系，并引入了一种对抗训练方法来减轻分布偏移。Fan等人[64]从统计角度研究不变学习问题，并提出了一个环境不变线性最小二乘目标函数。Li等人[142]则提出了一种不变信息瓶颈，通过互信息提取不变表示。
While the results from IRM seem encouraging, Rosenfeld et al. [217] highlight some issues with its application to classification tasks. In the linear case, they offer simple conditions under which the optimal solution either succeeds or, more often, fails to recover the optimal invariant predictor. Notably, Rosenfeld et al. [217] prove that a viable solution can outperform the optimal invariant predictor on all e∈Eall  ,using only environmental features (Theorem 5.3 in [217]). In a nonlinear context, they illustrate that IRM can fail dramatically unless the test data closely resemble the training distribution (Theorem 6.1 in [217]). Furthermore, Kamath et al. [116] demonstrate that it's possible for IRM to learn a sub-optimal predictor, due to non-invariant loss function across environments. Ahuja et al. [5] compare IRM with ERM from a sample complexity perspective across different shift patterns (Table 1 in [5]). They conclude that under covariate shifts, IRM doesn't show a clear advantage over ERM. However, in the case of other distribution shifts involving confounders or anti-causal variables, IRM is likely to be close to the desired OOD solutions within the finite sample regime. Recently, drawing inspiration from PAC learning, Parulekar et al. [194] provide finite-sample OOD generalization guarantees for approximate invariance. Meanwhile, Wang et al. [254] manage to reduce the required number of training environments to O(1) by using second-order moment information.
虽然 IRM 的结果看起来令人鼓舞，但 Rosenfeld 等人 [217] 提出了它在分类任务应用中的一些问题。在线性情况下，他们提出了在何种简单条件下，最优解要么成功，要么更常见的是，无法恢复最优不变预测器。值得注意的是，Rosenfeld 等人 [217] 证明了可行的解决方案可以在所有 e∈Eall  上仅使用环境特征超过最优不变预测器（[217] 中的定理 5.3）。在非线性背景下，他们说明了除非测试数据与训练分布非常相似（[217] 中的定理 6.1），否则 IRM 可能会显著失败。此外，Kamath 等人 [116] 证明了由于环境间非不变损失函数，IRM 可能学习到次优预测器。Ahuja 等人 [5] 从样本复杂性的角度比较了 IRM 和 ERM 在不同转移模式下的表现（[5] 中的表 1）。他们得出结论，在协变量转移的情况下，IRM 并没有显示出比 ERM 明显的优势。然而，在其他涉及混杂因素或反因果变量的分布转移情况下，IRM 在有限样本制度下可能接近期望的 OOD 解决方案。最近，受到 PAC 学习的启发，Parulekar 等人 [194] 为近似不变性提供了有限样本 OOD 泛化保证。同时，Wang 等人 [254] 通过使用二阶矩信息，设法将所需的训练环境数量减少到 O(1)。
Domain-irrelevant representation learning Ganin and Lempitsky [74], Ganin et al. [75] first introduce the concept of the Domain-Adversarial Neural Network (DANN) for domain adaptation. The goal of DANN is to cultivate representations that are both discriminative and impervious to domain shifts. This is accomplished by jointly optimizing the base features and a label predictor that predicts class labels during both training and inference phases. Concurrently, a domain classifier is trained to distinguish between source and target domains. By developing representations that confuse this domain classifier, features invariant to the domain are cultivated. Building on this, Li et al. [146] adapt this framework for scenarios where the target domain information is unknown, while Gong et al. [81] extend adversarial training into the manifold space. Li et al. [149] suggest the utilization of class-specific adversarial networks through a Conditional Invariant Adversarial Network (CIAN). Providing a theoretical foundation, Garg et al. [78] and Sicilia et al. [238] derive generalization bounds for domain adversarial training. Rahman et al. [206] propose a correlation-aware adversarial framework that can be applied to both Domain Adaptation (DA) and OOD generalization. This framework leverages both the correlation alignment metric and adversarial learning to minimize the domain discrepancy between the source and target data. On the application front, Shao et al. [232], Jia et al. [111], and Wang et al. [262] apply domain adversarial learning for face anti-spoofing and unseen target stance detection. Moreover, Zhao et al. [305] introduce an entropy-regularization approach that learns invariant representations by minimizing the KL-divergence between the conditional distributions of different source domains.
领域无关表示学习 Ganin 和 Lempitsky [74]，Ganin 等 [75] 首次提出了领域对抗神经网络（DANN）的概念，用于领域自适应。DANN 的目标是培养既具有判别性又对领域迁移具有抵抗力的表示。这是通过共同优化基础特征和一个标签预测器来实现的，该预测器在训练和推理阶段预测类标签。同时，训练一个领域分类器来区分源领域和目标领域。通过开发使领域分类器混淆的表示，培养了对领域不变的特征。基于此，Li 等 [146] 将此框架适应于目标领域信息未知的情况，而 Gong 等 [81] 将对抗训练扩展到流形空间。Li 等 [149] 提出通过条件不变对抗网络（CIAN）使用特定于类的对抗网络。Garg 等 [78] 和 Sicilia 等 [238] 为领域对抗训练推导了泛化界限，提供了理论依据。Rahman 等 [206] 提出了一个相关感知对抗框架，可以应用于领域自适应（DA）和OOD泛化。该框架利用相关对齐指标和对抗学习来最小化源数据和目标数据之间的领域差异。在应用方面，Shao 等 [232]、Jia 等 [111] 和 Wang 等 [262] 将领域对抗学习应用于面部反欺骗和未见目标立场检测。此外，Zhao 等 [305] 引入了一种熵正则化方法，通过最小化不同源领域的条件分布之间的KL散度来学习不变表示。
In addition to domain adversarial learning, numerous studies [248, 146, 169, 168, 167, 269] propose the alignment of features to cultivate domain invariant representations. Motiian et al. [180] recommend semantic alignment between various domains, achieved by minimizing the distance between samples of the same class but different domains, and maximizing the distance between samples from different classes and domains. Other research focuses on minimizing feature distribution divergence by reducing the Maximum Mean Discrepancy (MMD) distance [192,248,255] ,Wasserstein distance [308], or second-order correlation [241, 242, 198], for either Domain Adaptation (DA) or Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization. In more recent work, Niu et al. [187] integrate knowledge distillation to learn both domain-invariant and domain-specific representations. Yu et al. [291] employ a diffusion model to align training and testing distributions reversibly. Lv et al. [172] suggest extracting causal factors from input data and then reconstructing the invariant causal mechanisms. Wang et al. [259] implement causal invariant transformations that disturb only non-causal features to achieve invariance. Jiang and Veitch [112] exploit the shared causal structure of domains to learn invariant and transferable representations. Meanwhile, Jia and Zhang [109] learn distributional invariance across source domains to align vocabulary and feature distributions using prompting.
除了领域对抗学习之外，许多研究 [248, 146, 169, 168, 167, 269] 提出了对特征进行对齐以培养领域不变表征。Motiian 等人 [180] 建议在不同领域之间进行语义对齐，通过最小化同一类别但不同领域样本之间的距离，以及最大化来自不同类别和领域的样本之间的距离来实现。其他研究则专注于通过减少最大平均差异（MMD）距离 [192,248,255]，Wasserstein 距离 [308]，或二阶相关 [241, 242, 198]，来最小化特征分布差异，以实现领域适应（DA）或分布外（OOD）泛化。在更近的研究中，Niu 等人 [187] 集成知识蒸馏来学习既领域不变又领域特定的表征。Yu 等人 [291] 使用扩散模型来可逆地对齐训练和测试分布。Lv 等人 [172] 建议从输入数据中提取因果因素，然后重构不变因果机制。Wang 等人 [259] 实现了仅干扰非因果特征的因果不变变换以达到不变性。Jiang 和 Veitch [112] 利用领域的共享因果结构来学习不变且可迁移的表征。同时，Jia 和 Zhang [109] 学习源领域之间的分布不变性，使用提示来对齐词汇和特征分布。
Applications Nowadays, invariant learning has found wide-ranging applications, often yielding improved generalization performance. Wu et al. [264], Chen et al. [35], and Gui et al. [85] have applied invariant learning to graph data, achieving enhanced out-of-distribution (OOD) generalization performance. In the field of drug discovery, Yang et al. [282] propose to learn sub-structure invariance for OOD molecular representations. Expanding the concept of invariance into the realm of reinforcement learning, Saengkyongam et al. [220] introduce the notion of policy invariance. To mitigate the effects of unobserved confounders in recommendation systems, Wang et al. [263] apply invariant learning. And Li et al. [151] introduce invariant grounding to foster interpretability in video question-answering tasks.
应用如今，不变性学习已经广泛应用于各个领域，通常能够提高泛化性能。吴等人 [264]，陈等人 [35]，以及桂等人 [85] 将不变性学习应用于图数据，实现了增强的分布外（OOD）泛化性能。在药物发现领域，杨等人 [282] 提出学习子结构不变性以用于OOD分子表示。将不变性概念扩展到强化学习领域，Saengkyongam 等人 [220] 引入了策略不变性的概念。为了减轻推荐系统中未观测混杂因素的影响，王等人 [263] 应用不变性学习。李等人 [151] 引入不变性基础，以促进视频问答任务的可解释性。

4.1.3 Training Strategy
4.1.3 训练策略

In the field of Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization, several vision-related studies have focused on the development of training strategies designed to enhance the generalization capability of deep learning models applied to image data. These strategies can be broadly categorized into five key areas: Meta-Learning, Ensemble Learning, Self-Supervised Learning, Feature Normalization, and Prompt Tuning.
在分布外（OOD）泛化领域，许多与视觉相关的研究集中在开发训练策略上，这些策略旨在提高应用于图像数据的深度学习模型的泛化能力。这些策略可以广泛地分为五个关键领域：元学习、集成学习、自监督学习、特征归一化和提示调优。
Meta-learning Meta-learning establishes a unique learning paradigm, wherein knowledge is accrued over multiple learning episodes [102]. The concept of "episodes" in the training phase is first introduced by Finn et al. [68] in their model-agnostic meta-learning (MAML) approach for Domain Adaptation (DA). This concept has since greatly influenced research in the field of meta-learning for OOD generalization. In the seminal work of Li et al. [144], meta-learning is first applied to OOD generalization, paving the way for numerous subsequent improvements [14, 190, 150, 51, 165, 53, 54, 306,37] . The primary approach involves dividing the source domains into meta-train and meta-test sets. The model is then trained to simultaneously optimize both the meta-train and meta-test losses.
元学习 元学习建立了一种独特的学习范式，其中知识是在多个学习阶段中逐渐积累的 [102]。训练阶段中的“阶段”概念最早由Finn等人 [68] 在他们的模型无关元学习（MAML）方法中提出，用于域适应（DA）。这一概念此后极大地影响了元学习在OOD泛化领域的相关研究。在Li等人 [144] 的开创性工作中，元学习首次应用于OOD泛化，为后续的许多改进 [14, 190, 150, 51, 165, 53, 54, 306,37] 铺平了道路。主要方法包括将源域划分为元训练集和元测试集。然后训练模型同时优化元训练集和元测试集的损失。
Model-ensemble learning. Model-ensemble learning methods typically aim to improve generalization capability by utilizing an ensemble of distinct models, each one tailored for different source domains. Several studies adopt domain-specific subnetworks corresponding to individual source domains, while employing a singular classifier [308, 60, 48] or multiple domain-specific classifier heads [260]. Alternatively, some methods use domain-specific batch normalization for different domains to achieve better normalization results [226, 174]. Recently, given the promising performance of pre-trained models, a study by Dong et al. [50] evaluate the inter-class discriminability and inter-domain stability of these models, and construct an ensemble of top-ranked models. This approach achieves state-of-the-art performance on the DomainNet dataset [199].
模型集成学习。模型集成学习方法通常旨在通过使用不同的模型集成来提高泛化能力，每个模型都针对不同的源域进行定制。有几项研究采用了与单个源域相对应的特定域子网络，同时使用单个分类器 [308, 60, 48] 或多个特定域分类器头 [260]。另外，一些方法使用特定域的批量归一化来获得不同域的更好归一化结果 [226, 174]。最近，鉴于预训练模型的出色性能，Dong等人 [50] 评估了这些模型的类间区分度和域间稳定性，并构建了排名靠前的模型集成。该方法在DomainNet数据集 [199] 上实现了最先进的性能。
Self-supervised learning Drawing inspiration from self-supervised learning methods [188], Car-lucci et al. [28] combine a self-learning puzzles task with the classification task to learn robust representations. Ryu et al. [219] devise a strategy to sample positive and negative instances using a random forest. In an alternating training approach, Li et al. [145] separately train the convolutional layers and the classifier. To guard against overfitting to source domains, Huang et al. [105] introduce a self-challenging dropout algorithm.
自监督学习 从自监督学习方法[188]中获得启发，Car-lucci等人[28]将自学习谜题任务与分类任务相结合，以学习鲁棒表示。Ryu等人[219]设计了一种策略，使用随机森林来采样正例和负例。在交替训练方法中，Li等人[145]分别独立地训练卷积层和分类器。为了防止对源域的过拟合，Huang等人[105]引入了自我挑战丢弃算法。
Feature Normalization Several studies [241,242,113] have employed feature normalization to mitigate domain discrepancy. Pan et al. [193] introduce IBN-Net, which ingeniously integrates Instance Normalization (IN) [249] and Batch Normalization (BN) [107] as building blocks to both capture and reduce domain variance. Empirically, they discover that while IN provides visual and appearance invariance, it could potentially diminish the discriminative information of representations. Consequently, they suggest a combination of IN and BN in shallow layers, with only BN being employed in deeper layers. In the realm of style transfer, Huang and Belongie [104] propose the utilization of adaptive IN. Following the assumption that each feature map of a convolutional encoder can be segregated into style-related and shape-related components, Nam and Kim [184] explicitly combine BN and IN to learn style-invariant representations. Lastly, Jin et al. [114] present Style Normalization and Restitution (SNR), a method that distills task-related features from the residual post style normalization, thereby ensuring the discriminability of the features.
特征归一化 许多研究[241,242,113]已经采用特征归一化来减轻域差异。Pan等人[193]提出了IBN-Net，该网络巧妙地将实例归一化（IN）[249]和批量归一化（BN）[107]作为构建块整合在一起，既捕捉域变化也减少域变化。从实证上，他们发现虽然IN提供了视觉和外观不变性，但它可能会潜在地减少表示的判别信息。因此，他们建议在浅层使用IN和BN的组合，而在更深的层只使用BN。在风格迁移领域，Huang和Belongie[104]提出了使用自适应IN。基于卷积编码器的每个特征图可以分割成与风格相关和与形状相关的组件的假设，Nam和Kim[184]明确地结合了BN和IN来学习风格不变表示。最后，Jin等人[114]提出了风格归一化与恢复（SNR）方法，该方法从风格归一化后的残差中提取任务相关特征，从而确保特征的可判别性。
Prompt tuning Recently, with the remarkable zero-shot generalization exhibited by pre-trained vision-language models across a variety of downstream tasks, several works have sought to leverage prompt tuning during testing to further enhance the model's ability to generalize to unseen domains. Shu et al. [237] introduce an approach to learn adaptive prompts on the fly using a single test sample. This demonstrates superior generalization performance when compared to prior prompt tuning methodologies. In a different approach, Zhu et al. [311] optimize prompts employing equiangular tight frame (ETF) structures. Zheng et al. [307] integrate domain prompts into the Vision Transformer architecture to improve its generalization capabilities.
最近，随着预训练的视觉语言模型在各种下游任务中展现出卓越的零样本泛化能力，一些研究尝试在测试期间利用提示调整（prompt tuning）来进一步增强模型对未见领域的泛化能力。Shu等人[237]提出了一种方法，可以在单个测试样本上实时学习自适应提示。与之前的提示调整方法相比，这显示了更优的泛化性能。另一种方法中，Zhu等人[311]采用等角紧框架（equiangular tight frame, ETF）结构来优化提示。Zheng等人[307]将领域提示整合到视觉变换器（Vision Transformer）架构中，以提高其泛化能力。

4.2 No Environment Labels
4.2 无环境标签

In this section, we present methods that do not necessitate explicit environment labels. These approaches include stable learning, heterogeneity-aware learning, and others like flatness-aware learning.
在这一节中，我们介绍了一些不需要显式环境标签的方法。这些方法包括稳定学习、异质性感知学习以及类似平坦性感知学习等。

4.2.1 Stable Learning
4.2.1 稳定学习

Stable learning, as compared to causal and invariant learning, offers an alternative method for integrating causal inference with machine learning, significantly reducing the dependency on environment labels. The problem setting for stable learning is as follows:
与因果学习和不变性学习相比，稳定学习提供了一种将因果推理与机器学习集成的替代方法，显著减少了依赖环境标签。稳定学习的问题设置如下：
Problem 1 (Settings of Stable Learning). Given training data De=(Xe,Ye) from one environment e∈supp(Eall ) ,the goal of stable learning is to learn a predictive model with uniformly good performance on any possible environments in supp (Eall ) .
问题1（稳定学习的设置）。给定来自一个环境e∈supp(Eall )的训练数据De=(Xe,Ye)，稳定学习的目标是学习一个预测模型，在supp(Eall )中任意可能的环境上都能有均匀良好的性能。
To address this problem, drawing inspiration from variable balancing strategies as seen in the literature [12,314,87] ,Shen et al. [234] propose treating all variables as potential treatments and learning a set of global sample weights. These weights serve to remove any confounding bias for all potential treatments from the data distribution. They develop a global balancing loss that can be seamlessly integrated as a regularizer into standard machine learning tasks, as illustrated by Equation (4.12):
为了解决这个问题，受到文献[12,314,87]中变量平衡策略的启发，Shen等人[234]提出将所有变量视为潜在的干预措施，并学习一组全局样本权重。这些权重用于从数据分布中消除所有潜在干预措施的混杂偏差。他们开发了一个全局平衡损失，可以无缝地集成到标准机器学习任务中作为正则化项，如下方程（4.12）所示：
(4.12)∑j=1p⁡‖X−jT⋅(W⊙Ij)WT⋅Ij−X−jT⋅(W⊙(1−Ij))WT⋅(1−Ij)‖22,
where W represents the sample weights, |XI―j⋅(W⊙Ij)WT⋅Ij−X−jT⋅(W⊙(1−Ij))WT⋅(1−Ij)|22 signifies the loss of confounder balancing when setting feature j as the treatment variable. Here, X−j refers to all remaining features (i.e.,confounders) excluding the jth  column. Ij stands for the jth  column of I , and Iij indicates the treatment status of unit i when feature j is treated as the treatment variable. By minimizing the global balancing loss, it's possible to remove the confounding bias on a global scale. Furthermore, Kuang et al. [131] integrate unsupervised feature representation into the global balancing stage using auto-encoders [225] and adapt the original regularizer into a "deep" version.
其中 W 表示样本权重，|XI―j⋅(W⊙Ij)WT⋅Ij−X−jT⋅(W⊙(1−Ij))WT⋅(1−Ij)|22 表示将特征 j 作为处理变量时混杂因素平衡的损失。在这里，X−j 指的是除了 jth  列之外的所有剩余特征（即混杂因素）。Ij 代表 I 的 jth  列，而 Iij 表示当将特征 j 作为处理变量时单元 i 的处理状态。通过最小化全局平衡损失，可以在全局范围内消除混杂偏倚。此外，Kuang 等人 [131] 将无监督特征表示集成到全局平衡阶段，使用自动编码器 [225] 并将原始正则化器调整为“深度”版本。
The aforementioned methods primarily focus on binary features as mainstream discussions on causal inference predominantly involve binary treatments. However, when the treatment variable is categorical or continuous, traditional balancing methods become infeasible due to the potentially infinite treatment levels. To address this limitation, especially in situations involving continuous treatments, Kuang et al. [132] propose a solution to learn a set of sample weights. These weights are tailored such that the weighted distribution of the treatment and confounder meet the condition of independence. This corresponds to the fact that accurate treatment effect estimates can be obtained if the treatment and confounder are independent.
上述方法主要关注二元特征，因为因果推断的主流讨论主要涉及二元处理。然而，当处理变量是分类或连续的时，传统的平衡方法由于可能存在无限的处理水平而变得不可行。为了解决这个限制，特别是在涉及连续处理的情境中，Kuang 等人 [132] 提出了一个学习一组样本权重的解决方案。这些权重被定制，以便处理和混杂因素的加权分布满足独立性的条件。这对应于这样一个事实：如果处理和混杂因素独立，则可以获得准确的处理效果估计。
In addition to methods addressing confounder bias, Shen et al. [236] focus on the issue of model misspecification for linear models within the context of stable learning. The primary challenge for stable learning in linear cases stems from the unavoidable model misspecification that typically occurs in real-world scenarios. More specifically, the true generative process often contains not just the linear part, but also an additional misspecification term. This term could be a nonlinear element or interactions between input variables.
除了解决混杂偏倚的方法之外，Shen 等人 [236] 关注线性模型在稳定学习背景下的模型设定错误问题。线性情况下稳定学习的主要挑战源于实际场景中不可避免出现的模型设定错误。更具体地说，真实的生成过程通常不仅包含线性部分，还包含一个额外的设定错误项。这个项可能是一个非线性元素或输入变量之间的交互。
(4.13)y=x⊤β¯1;p+β¯0+b(x)+ϵ.
Shen et al. [236] reveal that the collinearity between variables is a crucial factor in achieving a stable model. If a mis-specified model is used at the training phase, the presence of collinearity amongst variables can escalate a minor mis-specification error to an arbitrarily large magnitude, resulting in unstable prediction performance across variably distributed test data. To mitigate the effects of collinearity among variables, Shen et al. [236] propose to learn a set of sample weights that promote near orthogonality in the design matrix. Technically, they construct an uncorrelated design matrix,denoted as X~ ,from the original X matrix,treating it as the ’oracle’. They then learn the sample weights w(x) by estimating the density ratio w(x)=pD~(x)/pD(x) between the underlying uncorrelated distribution D~ and the original distribution D .
Shen等人[236]揭示了变量间的共线性是实现稳定模型的一个关键因素。如果在训练阶段使用了指定错误的模型，变量间的共线性可能会将一个小的指定错误放大到任意大的程度，导致在变量分布不同的测试数据上预测性能不稳定。为了减轻变量间共线性的影响，Shen等人[236]提出学习一组样本权重，以促进设计矩阵的近似正交性。具体来说，他们从原始X矩阵构建了一个未相关的设计矩阵，记为X~，并将其视为“ oracle ”。然后，他们通过估计底层未相关分布D~与原始分布D之间的密度比w(x)=pD~(x)/pD(x)，学习样本权重w(x)。
To further mitigate the issues of large variance and the shrinkage of the effective sample size introduced by sample reweighting, Shen et al. [235] suggest leveraging unlabeled data gathered from multiple environments to uncover hidden cluster structures among variables. Under several technical assumptions, they demonstrate that decorrelating variables between clusters, rather than among themselves, is sufficient for achieving stable estimation without inflating the variance. In contrast, Yu et al. [289] propose an iterative framework that combines sample reweighting and a sparsity constraint to alleviate these issues, even without access to multiple environments. They provide theoretical proof that the introduction of a sparsity constraint can help lessen the requirement for large sample sizes when selecting stable variables.
为了进一步减轻样本重加权引入的大方差和有效样本量缩减问题，Shen等人[235]建议利用从多个环境中收集的无标签数据来揭示变量间的隐藏聚类结构。在几项技术假设下，他们证明了在聚类之间而不是聚类内部分离变量，足以在不增加方差的情况下实现稳定的估计。相比之下，Yu等人[289]提出了一种迭代框架，该框架结合了样本重加权和一个稀疏性约束，以减轻这些问题，即使在没有访问多个环境的情况下也是如此。他们提供了理论证明，引入稀疏性约束可以在选择稳定变量时减少对大样本量的需求。
Recently, Zhang et al. [298] propose StableNet, which extends former linear frameworks [131, 236, 132] to incorporate deep models. Due to the complexity of nonlinear dependencies among features derived from deep models, it is significantly more challenging to measure and eliminate the dependencies among features compared to linear cases. In response, StableNet introduces an innovative approach to nonlinear feature decorrelation, leveraging Random Fourier Features (RFF) [203]. Specifically,StableNet iteratively optimizes sample weights w ,representation function f ,and prediction function g as follows:
最近，张等人 [298] 提出了 StableNet，它将之前的线性框架 [131, 236, 132] 扩展为包含深度模型。由于来自深度模型的特征之间的非线性依赖关系的复杂性，与线性情况相比，测量和消除特征之间的依赖关系要困难得多。为此，StableNet 引入了一种创新的非线性特征解耦方法，利用随机傅里叶特征（RFF）[203]。具体来说，StableNet 依次优化样本权重 w，表示函数 f 和预测函数 g，如下所示：
(4.14)f(t+1),g(t+1)=arg⁡minf,g∑i=1n⁡wi(t)L(g(f(Xi)),yi),
w(t+1)=arg⁡minw∈Δn∑1≤i<j≤mZ⁡‖∑^Z:,i(t+1)Z:,j(t+1);w‖F2.
where Z(t+1)=f(t+1)(X),L(⋅,⋅) represents the cross entropy loss function and t represents the time stamp. In StableNet, the sample reweighting module and the representation learning network are jointly optimized. This efficient cooperation facilitates the isolation of environment-related features, thereby utilizing truly category-related and discriminative features for prediction. Consequently, StableNet can deliver more stable performances in non-stationary environments in the wild.
其中 Z(t+1)=f(t+1)(X),L(⋅,⋅) 表示交叉熵损失函数，t 表示时间戳。在 StableNet 中，样本重加权模块和表示学习网络是联合优化的。这种高效的合作促进了与环境相关的特征的隔离，从而为预测利用真正类别相关和区分性的特征。因此，StableNet 在野外非定常环境中能够提供更稳定的性能。
Subsequent studies building upon StableNet [298] have extended the feature decorrelation-based reweighting techniques to the areas of graph data [65] and natural language understanding [52]. Additionally, Zhang et al. [300] has broadened the scope of the OOD problem to object detection, examining the impact of distribution shifts in that field. In another extension, Kuang et al. [133] adopt subsampling techniques to mitigate the confounding effects brought about by distributional shifts. Also, by integrating the decorrelation mechanism, Wang et al. [261] is able to enhance clustering performance even under data selection bias. Further, Zhang et al. [297] propose a Deconfounded Visio-Linguistic Bert framework aimed at curbing potential data biases. Meanwhile, Yuan et al. [292] introduce a method for identifying causal features using a meta-learning mechanism for OOD generalization.
在 StableNet [298] 基础上的后续研究将基于特征解耦的重加权技术扩展到图数据 [65] 和自然语言理解 [52] 领域。此外，张等人 [300] 将 OOD 问题的范围扩展到目标检测，研究该领域中分布变化的影响。在另一个扩展中， Kuang 等人 [133] 采用子采样技术来减轻分布变化带来的混淆效应。同时，通过整合解耦机制，Wang 等人 [261] 能够即使在数据选择偏差的情况下也提高聚类性能。进一步地，张等人 [297] 提出了一个旨在抑制潜在数据偏见的 Deconfounded Visio-Linguistic Bert 框架。与此同时，Yuan 等人 [292] 引入了一种使用元学习机制识别因果特征的方法，用于 OOD 泛化。

4.2.2 Heterogeneity-Aware Learning
4.2.2 差异性感知学习

In addition to stable learning methods, several strategies have been developed to leverage the latent heterogeneity within data to enhance OOD generalization capabilities. In realistic scenarios, data often originates from various sources, often without explicit environmental labels, which makes multiple environments inaccessible. Moreover, it may be challenging to pre-define the types of environments needed, particularly in complex real-world applications such as recommendation systems, where numerous kinds of biases are present. Furthermore, theoretical analysis conducted in [157] shows that achieving desired invariance properties becomes particularly challenging when environments are not appropriately characterized.
除了稳定的学习方法外，还开发了几种策略，用以利用数据中的潜在差异性来增强OOD泛化能力。在现实场景中，数据通常来源于不同的源，往往没有明确的环境标签，这使得多个环境无法访问。此外，在诸如推荐系统之类的复杂现实世界应用中，预定义所需的环境类型可能具有挑战性，因为在这些系统中存在多种类型的偏差。此外，文献[157]进行的理论分析表明，当环境没有被适当地表征时，实现期望的不变性属性变得尤其困难。
In order to mitigate these practical issues, several works [157, 156, 41, 161, 164, 163] have sought to uncover and utilize the latent heterogeneity within data to improve invariance and generalization capabilities. Liu et al. [164] present the first quantitative definition of predictive heterogeneity using V -information [275],and propose an information maximization algorithm to explore this latent heterogeneity. Liu et al. [157] introduce Heterogeneous Risk Minimization (HRM), an optimization framework that simultaneously learns the heterogeneity within data and the invariant predictor. This framework consists of two interactive components: a frontend module, Mc ,for heterogeneity identification,and a backend module, Mp ,for invariant prediction. Given the pooled heterogeneous data, the process begins with the heterogeneity identification module Mc ,which uses the learned variant representation Ψ(X) to generate heterogeneous environments
