为了缓解这些实际问题，几项工作[157, 156, 41, 161, 164, 163]试图发掘并利用数据中的潜在差异性来提高不变性和泛化能力。Liu等人[164]首次使用V信息[275]提出了预测差异性的定量定义，并提出了一个信息最大化算法来探索这种潜在的差异性。Liu等人[157]引入了异质风险最小化（HRM），这是一个同时学习数据内在差异性和不变预测器的优化框架。该框架包括两个互动组件：一个用于差异性识别的前端模块Mc，和一个用于不变预测的后端模块Mp。给定混合的异质数据，过程从差异性识别模块Mc开始，该模块使用学习到的变体表示Ψ(X)来生成异质环境
Elearn  . These learned environments are then utilized by the OOD prediction module Mp to learn the Maximal Invariant Predictor (MIP [129]) Φ(X) ,as well as the invariant prediction model f(Φ(X)) . Subsequently,a better variant Ψ(X) is derived from the learned MIP Φ(X) ,which further enhances the heterogeneity identification process. Liu et al. [156] extend HRM to handle more complex data using the neural tangent kernel (NTK [108]). Recently, Liu et al. [161] provided a theoretical analysis of the invariant learning problem under latent heterogeneity,introducing the α0 -distributional invariance property as a relaxation of the strict invariance property. They analyze the learnability and the generalization gap bound for an OOD generalization problem within the context of this new property. In addition, Liu et al. [155] found that training the model twice, with higher sample weights for harder samples, yields good generalization performance. Furthermore, Idrissi et al. [106] propose a series of straightforward data balancing methods that achieve competitive performances for the worst-group.
Elearn  . 这些学习到的环境随后被OOD预测模块 Mp 用于学习最大不变预测器（MIP [129]）Φ(X)，以及不变预测模型 f(Φ(X)) 。接着，从学习到的MIP Φ(X) 中派生出一个更好的变体 Ψ(X)，这进一步增强了异质性识别过程。Liu等人 [156] 将HRM扩展到使用神经切线核（NTK [108]）处理更复杂的数据。最近，Liu等人 [161] 对潜在异质性下的不变学习问题进行了理论分析，引入了 α0 -分布不变性属性作为严格不变性属性的放松。他们分析了在新的属性背景下OOD泛化问题的学习性和泛化间隙界限。此外，Liu等人 [155] 发现，对模型进行两次训练，并为更难样本分配更高的样本权重，可以获得良好的泛化性能。此外，Idrissi等人 [106] 提出了一系列简单直观的数据平衡方法，这些方法在性能最差的组别中取得了有竞争力的表现。

4.2.3 Other Emergent Directions
4.2.3 其他新兴方向

Flatness-aware learning Recently, the field of flatness-aware learning in deep neural networks has garnered significant attention, delivering state-of-the-art results on several image datasets. Cha et al. [29] proposed Stochastic Weight Averaging Densely (SWAD) as a means of identifying flat minima solutions, which have demonstrated strong OOD generalization performance across five domain generalization benchmarks.
平坦度感知学习 最近，深度神经网络中的平坦度感知学习领域受到了广泛关注，在多个图像数据集上取得了最先进的结果。Cha等人 [29] 提出了随机权重平均密集（SWAD）方法，用于识别平坦最小值解，这些解在五个领域泛化基准测试中表现出了强大的OOD泛化性能。
Furthering this research, Zhang et al. [302] contest that Adam [124], despite being a popular choice, might not be the optimal optimizer for a large number of current OOD generalization methods. In response, they proposed a flatness-aware optimizer designed to efficiently locate both zeroth-order and first-order flat minima solutions. This optimizer has shown superior performance across a range of domain generalization datasets and benchmarks.
进一步推进这项研究，张等人[302]质疑Adam[124]，尽管它是一个流行的选择，但对于大量当前的OOD泛化方法来说，可能并不是最优的优化器。作为回应，他们提出了一种平面意识优化器，旨在有效地定位零阶和一阶平坦最小值解。这种优化器在一系列领域泛化数据集和基准测试中表现出了优越的性能。

5 Optimization for OOD Generalization
5 OOD泛化的优化

To address the Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization problem, apart from unsupervised representation learning and supervised model learning, robust optimization methods with theoretical guarantees have recently aroused much attention, which is both model agnostic and data structure agnostic, and therefore could be incorporated with various approaches. In this section, we mainly focus on the literature of distributionally robust optimization (DRO), which stems from the literature on operations research and raises more and more attention from the machine learning community.
为了解决分布外（OOD）泛化问题，除了无监督表征学习和监督模型学习之外，最近具有理论保证的鲁棒优化方法引起了广泛关注，这种方法既不依赖于模型，也不依赖于数据结构，因此可以与各种方法相结合。在本节中，我们主要关注分布鲁棒优化（DRO）的文献，该文献源于运筹学的研究，并越来越多地引起了机器学习社区的注意。
We first introduce the objective of these OOD optimization methods and then classify the methods according to the requirements of additional information. In order to address the problem from the optimization perspective, the OOD generalization problem is formulated as the worst-case prediction error among Eall  ,which takes the form of:
我们首先介绍这些OOD优化方法的目标，然后根据额外信息的需求对这些方法进行分类。为了从优化角度解决问题，OOD泛化问题被表述为在Eall 中的最坏情况预测误差，其形式为：
(5.1)arg⁡minf⁡maxe∈supp(Eall )⁡L(f∣e)
where Eall is the random variable on indices of all possible environments,and for all e∈supp(Eall) , the data and label distribution Pe(X,Y) can be quite different from that of training distribution Ptr(X,Y);L(f∣e)=E[l(f(X),Y)∣e]=Ee[l(f(Xe),Ye)] is the risk of predictor f on environment e , and l(⋅,⋅):Y×Y→R+ is the loss function. Intuitively,optimization methods aim to guarantee the worst-case performance under distributional shifts.
其中Eall是所有可能环境的索引的随机变量，对于所有e∈supp(Eall)，数据标签分布Pe(X,Y)可以与训练分布Ptr(X,Y);L(f∣e)=E[l(f(X),Y)∣e]=Ee[l(f(Xe),Ye)]大不相同Ptr(X,Y);L(f∣e)=E[l(f(X),Y)∣e]=Ee[l(f(Xe),Ye)]是预测器f在环境e上的风险，l(⋅,⋅):Y×Y→R+是损失函数。直观上，优化方法旨在保证在分布偏移下的最坏情况性能。

5.1 No Additional Information
5.1 无额外信息

Different from the aforementioned methods, distributionally robust optimization (DRO), from robust optimization literature, directly solves the OOD generalization problem by optimizing for the worst-case error over an uncertainty distribution set, so as to protect the model against the potential distributional shifts within the uncertainty set. The uncertainty set is often constrained by moment or support conditions [44,20],f -divergence [185,55,221] and Wasserstein distance [63,239,158,22,159,160,23,147,170] . The objective function of DRO methods can be summarized as:
与上述方法不同，分布鲁棒优化（DRO），来自鲁棒优化文献，通过在不确定性分布集上优化最坏情况误差，直接解决OOD泛化问题，从而保护模型免受不确定性集内潜在的分布偏移的影响。不确定性集通常受到矩或支撑条件[44,20],f -散度 [185,55,221] 和Wasserstein距离 [63,239,158,22,159,160,23,147,170] 的约束。DRO方法的客观函数可以概括为：
(5.2)arg⁡minf⁡supQ∈P(Ptr)⁡EX,Y∼Q[ℓ(f(X),Y)]
where P(Ptr) is the distribution set lying around the training distribution Ptr and ℓ(⋅;⋅):Y×Y→R+ is the loss function. Different DRO methods adopt different kinds of constraints to formulate the distribution set P(Ptr) and correspondingly different optimization algorithms. In this paper,we only introduce two typical DRO methods whose distribution sets are formulated by f -divergence and Wasserstein distance respectively, and for a more thorough introduction to DRO methods, one can refer to [205].
其中P(Ptr)是围绕训练分布Ptr的分布集，ℓ(⋅;⋅):Y×Y→R+是损失函数。不同的DRO方法采用不同类型的约束来构建分布集P(Ptr)，并相应地采用不同的优化算法。在本文中，我们只介绍两种典型的DRO方法，它们的分布集分别由f -散度和Wasserstein距离构建，对于DRO方法的更详细介绍，可以参考[205]。

5.1.1 f -Divergence Constraints
5.1.1 f -散度约束

The distribution set P(Ptr) in f -divergence DRO [55] is formulated as:
在f -散度DRO [55]中的分布集P(Ptr)被构建为：
(5.3)P(Ptr)={Q:Df(Q∥Ptr)≤ρ}
where ρ>0 controls the extent of the distributional shift,and Df(Q∥Ptr)=∫f(dQdPtr)dPtr is the f - divergence between Q and Ptr . Intuitively,if the potential testing distribution Petest (X,Y)∈P(Ptr) , DRO methods can achieve good generalization performance even if Petest(X,Y)≠Ptr(X,Y) . As for the optimization,a simplified dual formulation for the Cressie-Read family of f -divergence can be obtained.
其中ρ>0控制分布偏移的程度，Df(Q∥Ptr)=∫f(dQdPtr)dPtr是f - 散度在Q和Ptr之间。直观上，如果潜在的测试分布Petest (X,Y)∈P(Ptr)，DRO方法即使Petest(X,Y)≠Ptr(X,Y)也能实现良好的泛化性能。至于优化，对于Cressie-Read族的f -散度可以得到简化的对偶形式。
Lemma 1 (Optimization of f -divergence [55]). For fk(t)=tk−kt+k−1k(k−1) and k∈(1,+∞),k∗= k/(k−1) ,and any ρ>0 ,we have for all θ∈Θ :
引理1（f -散度优化 [55]）。对于fk(t)=tk−kt+k−1k(k−1)和k∈(1,+∞),k∗= k/(k−1)，以及任何ρ>0，对于所有θ∈Θ我们有：
(5.4)Rk(θ;Ptr)=infη∈R⁡{ck(ρ)EPtr[(ℓ(f(X),Y)−η)+k∗]1k∗+η}
where ck(ρ)=(k(k−1)ρ+1)1k .
其中ck(ρ)=(k(k−1)ρ+1)1k。

5.1.2 Wasserstein Distance Constraints
5.1.2 Wasserstein距离约束

Since the calculation of f -divergence requires the supports of two distributions to be the same while Wasserstein distance does not,the distribution set P(Ptr) formulated by Wasserstein distance is more flexible. Wasserstein distance is defined as:
由于计算f散度需要两个分布的支持集相同，而Wasserstein距离不需要，因此由Wasserstein距离形成的分布集P(Ptr)更加灵活。Wasserstein距离定义为：
Definition 3. Let Z⊂Rm+1 and Z=X×Y ,given a transportation cost function c:Z×Z→[0,∞) , which is nonnegative, lower semi-continuous and satisfies c(z,z)=0 , for probability measures P and Q supported on Z ,the Wasserstein distance between P and Q is :
定义3. 设Z⊂Rm+1和Z=X×Y，给定一个运输成本函数c:Z×Z→[0,∞)，其为非负、下半连续且满足c(z,z)=0，对于在Z上支持的概率测度P和Q，P与Q之间的Wasserstein距离为：
(5.5)Wc(P,Q)=infM∈Π(P,Q)⁡E(z,z′)∼M[c(z,z′)]
where Π(P,Q) denotes the couplings with M(A,Z)=P(A) and M(Z,A)=Q(A) for measures M on Z×Z .
其中Π(P,Q)表示在Z×Z上的测度M的M(A,Z)=P(A)和M(Z,A)=Q(A)耦合。
Then the distribution set P(Ptr) of Wasserstein DRO is formulated as:
然后，Wasserstein DRO的分布集P(Ptr)被定义为：
(5.6)Pc(Ptr)={Q:Wc(Q,Ptr)≤ρ}
where the subscript c denotes the transportation cost function c(⋅,⋅) . However,Wasserstein DRO is difficult to optimize and works targeting different models and transportation cost functions have been proposed. Wasserstein DRO for logistic regression was proposed by Shafieezadeh-Abadeh et al. [228]. Sinha et al. [239] achieved moderate levels of robustness with little computational cost relative to empirical risk minimization with a Lagrangian penalty formulation of WDRO. Recently, Li et al. [147] add martingale constraints to WDRO and derive tractable optimization for martingale DRO. And Liu et al. [159] incorporate geometric properties into DRO with geometric Wasserstein distance.
其中下标c表示运输成本函数c(⋅,⋅)。然而，Wasserstein DRO难以优化，已经提出了针对不同模型和运输成本函数的工作。Shafieezadeh-Abadeh等人[228]提出了用于逻辑回归的Wasserstein DRO。Sinha等人[239]通过WDRO的Lagrangian惩罚公式，与经验风险最小化相比，实现了中等水平的鲁棒性，且计算成本较低。最近，Li等人[147]在WDRO中添加了鞅约束，并推导了可处理的鞅DRO优化。Liu等人[159]将几何性质引入到具有几何Wasserstein距离的DRO中。

5.1.3 Robustness Guarantees
5.1.3 鲁棒性保证

Here we briefly review some theoretical results in DRO literature, including the relationship between regularization and robustness guarantees.
在这里，我们简要回顾DRO文献中的一些理论结果，包括正则化与鲁棒性保证之间的关系。
In order to demonstrate how the robust formulation (5.2) provides distributional robustness, several works establish the relationship between distributional robustness and regularization. For norm-based DRO methods, El Ghaoui and Lebret [62] build the equivalence between the worst-case squared residual within a Frobenius norm-based distribution set and the Tikhonov regularization. Xu et al. [268] prove the equivalence between robust linear regression with feature perturbations and the Least Absolute Shrinkage and Selection Operator(LASSO). Yang and Xu [283] and Bertsimas and Copenhaver [19] make some further progress on this. For f -divergence-based DRO methods, Duchi et al. [58] prove that the formulation (5.2) with distribution set P(Ptr)=Pρ,n={p∈Rn : pT1=1,p≥0,Df(p∥1/n)≤ρ/n} is a convex approximation to regularizing the empirical risk by variance. For Wasserstein-based DRO methods, Shafieezadeh-Abadeh et al. [228] investigate the Wasserstein DRO of logistic regression and show that the regularized logistic regression is one special case of it. Chen and Paschalidis [31] also build the connection between the Wasserstein DRO of linear regression with ℓ1 loss function and regularization constraints on the regression coefficients. Shafieezadeh-Abadeh et al. [229] and Gao et al. [76] connect the Wasserstein DRO and regularizations in a unified framework. Li et al. [147] prove that Wasserstein DRO is equivalent to Tikhonov regularization when exact martingale constraints are imposed.
为了证明稳健公式（5.2）如何提供分布稳健性，一些研究建立了分布稳健性与正则化之间的关系。对于基于范数的DRO方法，El Ghaoui和Lebret[62]建立了基于Frobenius范数的分布集中最坏情况下的平方残差与Tikhonov正则化之间的等价性。Xu等人[268]证明了带有特征扰动的稳健线性回归与最小绝对收缩和选择算子（LASSO）之间的等价性。Yang和Xu[283]以及Bertsimas和Copenhaver[19]在这方面取得了进一步进展。对于基于f散度的DRO方法，Duchi等人[58]证明了带有分布集P(Ptr)=Pρ,n={p∈Rn:pT1=1,p≥0,Df(p∥1/n)≤ρ/n}的公式（5.2）是对通过方差正则化经验风险的凸近似。对于基于Wasserstein的DRO方法，Shafieezadeh-Abadeh等人[228]研究了逻辑回归的Wasserstein DRO，并表明正则化的逻辑回归是其一种特殊情况。Chen和Paschalidis[31]还建立了线性回归的Wasserstein DRO与ℓ1损失函数以及对回归系数的正则化约束之间的联系。Shafieezadeh-Abadeh等人[229]和高等人[76]在一个统一框架中联系了Wasserstein DRO和正则化。Li等人[147]证明了在施加精确鞅约束时，Wasserstein DRO与Tikhonov正则化等价。
As for the OOD generalization ability, in fact, the guarantees for OOD generalization of DRO methods naturally derive their formulation (5.2). Since DRO methods directly optimize for the worst-case risk within the distribution set P(Ptr) ,as long as the potential testing distribution Pte∈P(Ptr) ,the OOD generalization ability is guaranteed. Therefore,the remaining work is to provide the finite sample convergence guarantees, which ensure that the population-level objective supQ∈P(Ptr)⁡EQ[ℓ(f(X),Y)] can be optimized empirically with finite samples. Duchi and Namkoong [55] analyze the generalization bound of f -divergence-based DRO. Sinha et al. [239],Chen and Paschalidis [31] and Liu et al. [158] also provide similar generalization bounds for Wasserstein DRO. Also, Levy et al. [141] come up with optimization methods for DRO of convex losses with conditional value at risk and X2 -divergence uncertainty sets,which are suitable for large-scale applications.

5.2 With Additional Information

Although DRO methods could theoretically guarantee the out-of-distribution generalization ability when Petest(X,Y)∈P(Ptr) ,there has been work questioning their real effects in practice. Intuitively, in order to achieve good OOD generalization ability, the potential testing distribution should be captured in the built distribution set. However, in real scenarios, to contain the possible true testing distribution, the uncertainty set is often overwhelmingly large, making the learned model make decisions with fairly low confidence, which is also referred to as the low confidence problem. Specifically, Hu et al. [103] proved that in classification tasks, DRO ends up being optimal for the training distribution Ptr ,which is due to the over-flexibility of the built distribution set. And Frogner et al. [71] also pointed out the problem of overwhelmingly-large decision set for Wasserstein DRO.
In order to overcome such a problem, Blanchet et al. [22] propose a data-driven way to select the transportation cost function. Frogner et al. [71] propose to further restrict the distribution set with a large number of unlabeled data. Liu et al. [159] notice that in real scenarios, different covariates may be perturbed in a non-uniform way, and form a more reasonable distribution set according to the stability of covariates across environments. Duchi et al. [57] assume that P(Y∣X) stays invariant and propose to only perturb the marginal distribution P(X) to deal with covariate shifts. Though some meaningful attempts, how to incorporate additional information to form a more reasonable distribution set is also an open problem. We refer readers to [204] for a more comprehensive survey.
为了克服这样的问题，Blanchet等人[22]提出了一种数据驱动的方法来选择运输成本函数。Frogner等人[71]提出要进一步用大量未标记数据限制分布集。Liu等人[159]注意到，在现实场景中，不同的协变量可能会以非均匀的方式受到干扰，并根据协变量在不同环境中的稳定性形成一个更合理的分布集。Duchi等人[57]假设 P(Y∣X) 保持不变，并提出仅扰动边际分布 P(X) 来应对协变量偏移。尽管有一些有意义的尝试，但如何结合额外信息形成一个更合理的分布集仍然是一个开放性问题。我们建议读者参考[204]，以获得更全面的调查。

6 Theoretical Connections
6 理论联系

For branches of methods for OOD generalization, there are some inherent connections among them. In this section, we will demonstrate the connections among causal learning methods, distribution-ally robust optimization (DRO) methods, and stable learning methods, which may benefit the understanding of OOD generalization methods.
对于OOD泛化的方法分支，它们之间存在一些固有的联系。在本节中，我们将展示因果学习方法、分布鲁棒优化（DRO）方法和稳定学习方法之间的联系，这有助于理解OOD泛化方法。

6.1 DRO and Causality
6.1 DRO与因果性

Recall that DRO methods aim to optimize the worst-case error over a pre-defined distribution set, so as to protect the learned model from potential distributional shifts, which often take the form of:
回顾DRO方法旨在优化预定义分布集上的最坏情况误差，以保护学习模型免受潜在的分布偏移的影响，这通常采取以下形式：
(6.1)arg⁡minf⁡supQ∈P(Ptr)⁡EX,Y∼Q[ℓ(f(X),Y)]
where P(Ptr) is the distribution set built around the training distribution Ptr . Although in DRO literature, P(Ptr) is often characterized by f -divergence or Wasserstein distance,different choices of P(Ptr) will render DRO equivalent to causal inference in the structural equation model (SEM) context[178], which shows the inherent relationship between causality-based methods and DRO methods. Taking linear equation models for example, suppose we have a directed acyclic graph G=(V,E) with p nodes V={1,…,p} and correspondingly a p -dimension random variable Z ,then the training distribution is determined by the structural causal model (SCM) as:
其中 P(Ptr) 是围绕训练分布 Ptr 构建的分布集。尽管在 DRO 文献中，P(Ptr) 通常由 f 散度或 Wasserstein 距离表征，但不同选择下的 P(Ptr) 会使得 DRO 在结构方程模型（SEM）背景下等同于因果推断 [178]，这显示了基于因果的方法与 DRO 方法之间的内在联系。以线性方程模型为例，假设我们有一个有 p 个节点 V={1,…,p} 的有向无环图 G=(V,E)，相应地有一个 p 维随机变量 Z，那么训练分布由结构因果模型（SCM）确定如下：
(6.2)Z=BZ+ϵ
where Z=(X,Y)∈Rp is the random variable of interest, B∈Rp×p is the coefficient matrix and ϵ∼Pϵ the random noise. We will show that finding causal coefficients for predicting Y can be reformulated as performing DRO on interventional distribution set, including do-interventional and shift-interventional distributions.
其中 Z=(X,Y)∈Rp 是感兴趣的随机变量，B∈Rp×p 是系数矩阵，ϵ∼Pϵ 是随机噪声。我们将证明寻找预测 Y 的因果系数可以重新表述为在干预分布集上执行 DRO，包括 do 干预和移位干预分布。
Do-interventions on variables S⊆V can be formulated as:
对变量 S⊆V 的 do 干预可以表述为：
(6.3)Zk=(BZ)k+ϵ for k∉S;ZK=Ak for k∈S
where A∈Rp and the value of the do-intervention on variable k∈S is Ak . Then the error distribution Pϵ ,coefficient matrix B ,intervention set S⊆V and intervention value A∈Rp induces a distribution for a random variable Z(A,S) ,denoted as Z(A,S)∼PA,S(do) . And the corresponding do-interventional distribution set can be formulated as P(do)={PA,V/{p}(do):A∈Rp} . Analogously to do-interventions, the shift-interventions is defined as:
其中 A∈Rp 和对变量 k∈S 的 do 干预的值是 Ak。那么误差分布 Pϵ、系数矩阵 B、干预集 S⊆V 和干预值 A∈Rp 引导了一个随机变量 Z(A,S) 的分布，记作 Z(A,S)∼PA,S(do)。相应的 do 干预分布集可以表述为 P(do)={PA,V/{p}(do):A∈Rp}。类似于 do 干预，移位干预定义为：
(6.4)Z=BZ+ϵ+A
where A∈Rp is the shift direction,and the induced distribution is denoted as Z(A)∼PA(shift)  and the shift-interventional distribution set can be formulated as P(shift) ={PA(shift) :Ap=0} .
其中 A∈Rp 是移位方向，引起的分布记作 Z(A)∼PA(shift) ，移位干预分布集可以表述为 P(shift) ={PA(shift) :Ap=0}。
When performing DRO on P(do) or P(shift)  ,causal coefficients can be obtained [178] since
当在 P(do) 或 P(shift)  上执行DRO时，可以得到因果系数 [178] ，因为
(6.5)minθ⁡supQ∈P(do)⁡E[ℓ(fθ(X),Y)]={∞, if θ≠θcausal Var(ϵp), if θ=θcausal 
and
和
(6.6)minθ⁡supQ∈P(shift )⁡E[ℓ(fθ(X),Y)]={∞, if θ≠θcausal Var(ϵp), if θ=θcausal 
which reveals that causal inference can also be viewed as a special case of distributional robustness.
这表明因果推断也可以被视为分布鲁棒性的一个特例。

6.2 Stable Learning and Causality
6.2 稳定学习与因果性

Xu et al. [273] theoretically analyze stable learning algorithms through the lens of feature selection and connect them with causality. They first prove that these algorithms could identify a certain set of variables defined as follows.
Xu等人[273]通过特征选择的角度理论分析了稳定学习算法，并将其与因果性联系起来。他们首先证明这些算法可以识别以下定义的一组变量。
Definition 4 (Minimal stable variable set [273]). A minimal stable variable set of Y under distribution P is any subset S of X for which
定义4（最小稳定变量集[273]）。在分布 P 下的 Y 的最小稳定变量集是 X 的任一子集 S ，满足
(6.7)EP[Y∣S]=EP[Y∣X]
and none of S ’s proper subsets satisfies Equation (6.7).
且 S 的任何真子集都不满足方程（6.7）。
They theoretically show that the minimal stable variable set is minimal and optimal to deal with covariate-shift generalization for common loss functions [273, Theorem 3]. As a result, the effectiveness of stable learning algorithms on covariate-shift generalization could be proved.
他们从理论上证明了最小稳定变量集对于处理常见损失函数的协变量偏移泛化是最小且最优的 [273，定理3]。因此，可以证明稳定学习算法在协变量偏移泛化上的有效性。
Furthermore, they show that the minimal stable variable set is a subset of the Markov boundary [197]. Markov boundary discovery is generally challenging because traditional methods [7,8] are always based on the conditional independence test, which is a particularly difficult hypothesis to test for [231]. As a result, stable learning algorithms could help discover the Markov boundary to some extent, which can be of independent interest.
此外，他们还表明最小稳定变量集是Markov边界[197]的一个子集。Markov边界的发现通常具有挑战性，因为传统方法 [7,8] 都是基于条件独立性测试，这对于 [231] 来说是一个特别难以测试的假设。因此，在某种程度上，稳定学习算法可以帮助发现Markov边界，这具有独立的意义。
Table 1. Commonly used image datasets for OOD generalization. Shift type denotes the type of distributional shifts, and the mixed type in image type means that there are both real and unreal images.
表1。OOD泛化中常用的图像数据集。迁移类型表示分布偏移的类型，图像类型中的混合类型意味着既有真实图像也有非真实图像。

7 Evaluation for OOD Generalization
7 OOD泛化的评估

To promote the research of OOD generalization, it is of vital importance to evaluate the OOD generalization performances of different algorithms. In this section, we summarize the datasets commonly used in literature.
为了促进OOD泛化的研究，评估不同算法的OOD泛化性能至关重要。在本节中，我们总结了文献中常用的数据集。
Datasets can be classified according to different criteria (e.g., synthetic data and real-world data; tabular data, image data, and language data). And researchers from different fields utilize different kinds of datasets, for example, statistical machine learning often uses synthetic & tabular data, while computer vision researchers often use real-world & image data. As for the OOD generalization, it is necessary to involve distribution shifts to evaluate the generalization ability of different approaches. In line with recent works, we present a comprehensive overview of datasets and evaluation metrics of OOD generalization.
数据集可以根据不同的标准进行分类（例如，合成数据与现实世界数据；表格数据、图像数据和语言数据）。不同领域的研究人员利用不同类型的数据集，例如，统计机器学习通常使用合成和表格数据，而计算机视觉研究人员通常使用现实世界和图像数据。至于OOD泛化，涉及分布偏移是必要的，以评估不同方法的泛化能力。遵循近期的工作，我们提供了一个关于OOD泛化数据集和评估指标的全面概述。

7.1 Synthetic Data
7.1 合成数据

Synthetic data are important for simulating explainable and controllable distribution shifts. Aubin et al. [13] find that recent OOD generalization methods perform poorly on some simple low-dimensional linear problems. This demonstrates the need for such simple but challenging data, which could precisely reflect to what extent an algorithm could resist certain kinds of distribution shifts.
合成数据对于模拟可解释和可控制的分布偏移非常重要。Aubin等人[13]发现，最近的OOD泛化方法在一些简单的低维线性问题上表现不佳。这表明了需要这样简单但具有挑战性的数据，它们可以精确地反映算法能够抵抗某种分布偏移的程度。
In this section, we introduce three typical synthetic data generation mechanisms, with which one can simulate certain kinds of distribution shifts to various degrees and evaluate the generalization ability of different algorithms. Throughout these mechanisms,covariates X are divided into two groups as X=[S,V]T ,corresponding to the stable and unstable/spurious parts,i.e. P(Y∣S) remains invariant across distributions and P(Y∣V) is perturbed to bring distributional shifts.
在这一节中，我们介绍了三种典型的合成数据生成机制，通过这些机制可以在不同程度上模拟某些类型的分布偏移，并评估不同算法的泛化能力。在这些机制中，协变量X被分为两组，即X=[S,V]T，对应于稳定和不稳定/虚假部分，即P(Y∣S)在各个分布中保持不变，而P(Y∣V)被扰动以引起分布偏移。
Unobserved Confounders Confounding bias is one of the most sources of distribution shifts [196,240,11] ,where the unstable covariates V are related to target Y owing to the unobserved confounder C . Here we present the data generation process proposed by Subbaswamy and Saria [240]:
未观测到的混杂因素 混杂偏误是分布偏移的最常见来源之一[196,240,11]，其中不稳定的协变量V由于未观测到的混杂因素C与目标Y相关。在这里，我们介绍了Subbaswamy和Saria[240]提出的数据生成过程：
(7.1)V=WVeC+ϵV,Y=WSTS+WcC+ϵY,
where C is the unobserved confounder. Coefficient WVe controls the relationship between V and Y , and one can change WVe across environments to simulate distribution shifts.
其中 C 是未观测到的混杂因素。系数 WVe 控制了 V 与 Y 之间的关系，并且可以在不同环境中改变 WVe 以模拟分布偏移。
Selection Bias Kuang et al. [132] propose a selection bias mechanism, and similar settings are also adopted in [158,157,289] . In this setting, P(Y∣V) is perturbed with selection bias. The data generation process is as follows:
选择偏差 Kuang 等人 [132] 提出了一个选择偏差机制，并且在 [158,157,289] 中也采用了类似的设置。在这个设置中，P(Y∣V) 会受到选择偏差的干扰。数据生成过程如下：
(7.2)Y=f(S)+ϵ=θSTS+βS1⋅S2⋅S3+ϵ,
and the sample selection probability P^(X) of each data point follows:
并且每个数据点的样本选择概率 P^(X) 服从以下规律：
(7.3)P^(X)=∏vi∈V⁡|r|−5∗|f(S)−sign(r)∗vi|
|r|>1 is the bias factor to control the strength of distribution shifts. The larger value of |r| brings the stronger spurious correlation between V and Y ,and r≥0 means positive correlation and vice versa.
|r|>1 是控制分布偏移强度的偏差因子。较大的 |r| 值会带来 V 与 Y 之间更强的虚假相关性，r≥0 表示正相关，反之亦然。
Regression from Causes and Effects Arjovsky et al. [11] and Liu et al. [157] introduce an anti-causal mechanism to change P(Y∣V) . In this setting,the data generation process is defined as:
从原因到结果的回归 Arjovsky 等人 [11] 和 Liu 等人 [157] 引入了一个反因果机制来改变 P(Y∣V)。在这个设置中，数据生成过程定义为：
(7.4)Y=WSS+ϵY,V=WVeY+ϵVe
where the coefficient WVe and ϵy,ϵVe control the relationship between V and Y . Intuitively,larger ϵY and smaller ϵVe will make the model easier to utilize V for prediction,making OOD generalization more challenging.
其中系数 WVe 和 ϵy,ϵVe 控制了 V 与 Y 之间的关系。直观上，较大的 ϵY 和较小的 ϵVe 会使得模型更容易利用 V 进行预测，使得OOD泛化更具挑战性。
There are various synthetic data generation mechanisms in literature, and one can refer to [13,222,160] for more synthetic settings.
文献中有各种合成数据生成机制，读者可以参考 [13,222,160] 以获取更多的合成设置。

7.2 Real-World Data
7.2 真实世界数据

Although synthetic data could reflect the generalization ability of different approaches, they are difficult to generate complicated data (e.g., image/language data), and whether the simulated shift patterns correspond with real-world scenarios remain unclear. To demonstrate the practical value of OOD generalization methods, it is necessary to involve real-world datasets for evaluation. Here, we describe several typical real-world (and pseudo-real) benchmarks used in OOD generalization literature, including image, tabular, language, graph, and code data.
尽管合成数据可以反映不同方法的泛化能力，但它们难以生成复杂的数据（例如图像/语言数据），并且模拟的偏移模式是否与现实世界场景相符仍然不清楚。为了证明OOD泛化方法在实际中的价值，有必要涉及现实世界的数据集进行评估。在这里，我们描述了OOD泛化文献中使用的几种典型的现实世界（和伪现实）基准，包括图像、表格、语言、图形和代码数据。
Image Data With the rapid development of computer vision, a number of image datasets have been released. According to the flexibility of customizing distribution shifts, we classify them into three categories, namely pseudo-real shifts, static natural shifts, and controllable natural shifts. A summary of these datasets is shown in Table 1.
图像数据 随着计算机视觉的快速发展，已经发布了大量的图像数据集。根据定制分布偏移的灵活性，我们将它们分为三类，即伪现实偏移、静态自然偏移和可控自然偏移。这些数据集的总结如表1所示。
(A) PSEUDO-REAL SHIFTS. For image datasets not designed for OOD generalization, some synthetic transformations are added to introduce distribution shifts. The most typical ones, including Ima-geNet [45] variants (e.g. ImageNet-A [100], ImageNet-C [97], ImageNet-R [99]) adopt data selection mechanisms or perturbations to generate testing data with distribution shifts. Others, typified by MNIST [138] variants (e.g. Colored MNIST [11], MNIST-R [80]), simulate different environments
（A）伪现实偏移。对于不是为OOD泛化设计的图像数据集，添加一些合成转换以引入分布偏移。最典型的包括ImageNet [45] 变体（例如 ImageNet-A [100]、ImageNet-C [97]、ImageNet-R [99]），它们采用数据选择机制或扰动来生成具有分布偏移的测试数据。其他以MNIST [138] 变体（例如 Colored MNIST [11]、MNIST-R [80]）为代表的，通过给原始图像着色或旋转来模拟不同的环境。Waterbirds [221] 引入了鸟类类别和背景之间的虚假相关性。这些数据集使得对OOD泛化方法的初步研究和评估成为可能。
by coloring or rotating original images. And Waterbirds [221] introduces spurious correlations between bird categories and backgrounds. These datasets make it available for preliminary study and evaluation of OOD generalization approaches.
通过着色或旋转原始图像。Waterbirds [221] 引入了鸟类类别和背景之间的虚假相关性。这些数据集使得初步研究和评估OOD泛化方法成为可能。
(B) Static Natural Shifts. Recently, there are a few datasets supporting OOD generalization validation, which mainly involve natural shifts, e.g., spatial and temporal shifts. Widely used in domain generalization, PACS [143] and Office-Home [252] design environments according to image styles, and VLCS [66] and iWildCam [16] directly uses data sources as environments. Besides, Camelyon17 [15] contains tissue slides sampled and post-processed in different hospitals and Do-mainNet [304] extends PACS to a larger scale, consisting of more domains and categories. Recently, Koh et al. [127] collect several datasets together and produce Wilds as a benchmark for OOD generalization. And Yao et al. [285] curate Wild-Time to reflect temporal distribution shifts in various real-world applications.
(B) 静态自然偏移。近期，有一些数据集支持OOD泛化验证，这些数据集主要涉及自然偏移，例如空间和时间偏移。在域泛化中广泛使用，PACS [143] 和 Office-Home [252] 根据图像样式设计环境，而 VLCS [66] 和 iWildCam [16] 直接使用数据源作为环境。此外，Camelyon17 [15] 包含来自不同医院采样和后处理的组织切片，而 DomainNet [304] 将 PACS 扩展到更大规模，包括更多的域和类别。最近，Koh 等人 [127] 将多个数据集汇总在一起，形成 Wilds 作为OOD泛化的基准。Yao 等人 [285] 整理了 Wild-Time，以反映各种实际应用中的时间分布偏移。
(c) Controllable Natural Shifts. Recently, there are datasets enabling more flexible and controllable ways to simulate distributional shifts, typified by NICO [94] and NICO++ [299]. NICO elaborately selects visual contexts with various types, including background, attribute, view and etc. With diverse contexts, NICO could simulate different types of natural shifts, and with a balanced sample size in each context, different degrees of distribution shifts could be easily produced. As an extended version of NICO,NICO++ splits domains into common domains (shared by all categories) and unique domains (for each category). For each category, NICO++ contains 10 common domains and 10 unique domains, supporting both typical DA and OOD generalization settings with flexible and controllable shifts. Besides, FMoW[40] collects satellite images of buildings or land with tokens at different times and regions, and PovertyMap[288] contains images of an urban or rural area from disjoint sets of countries.
(c) 可控自然偏移。近期，有数据集能够以更灵活和可控的方式模拟分布偏移，以 NICO [94] 和 NICO++ [299] 为代表。NICO 精心选择了各种类型的视觉上下文，包括背景、属性、视角等。借助多种上下文，NICO 能够模拟不同类型的自然偏移，并且每个上下文中样本数量平衡，可以轻松产生不同程度的分布偏移。作为 NICO,NICO++ 的扩展版本，将域分为公共域（所有类别共享）和唯一域（每个类别一个）。对于每个类别，NICO++ 包含 10 个公共域和 10 个唯一域，支持具有灵活和可控偏移的典型域自适应和OOD泛化设置。此外，FMoW[40] 收集了不同时间和地区带有标记的建筑物或土地的卫星图像，而 PovertyMap[288] 包含来自不同国家集合的城市或乡村地区的图像。
Tabular Data Tabular data widely exist in real-world high-stake applications, including economics, health care, and so on. Therefore, it is important to deal with natural distribution shifts in tabular data. House sales price dataset 1 considers temporal shifts in price prediction and is used in [236,158,157] . And demographic shifts are considered in Adult 2 ,BRFSS 3 ,COMPAS 4 datasets. Spatial shifts are considered in ACS datasets [47], which contains data from 51 US states. Recently, Liu et al. [162] propose WHTSHIFT, an empirical testbed with curated real-world shifts, where the type of shift is specified for each of the 22 settings.
表格数据 表格数据在现实世界的高风险应用中广泛存在，包括经济学、医疗保健等。因此，处理表格数据的自然分布偏移是很重要的。房价销售数据集 1 考虑了价格预测中的时间偏移，并被用于 [236,158,157] 。Adult 2、BRFSS 3、COMPAS 4 数据集考虑了人口统计偏移。ACS 数据集 [47] 考虑了空间偏移，其中包含了来自美国51个州的数据。最近，Liu 等人 [162] 提出了 WHTSHIFT，这是一个带有精心挑选的现实世界偏移的实证测试平台，其中为22个设置中的每一个指定了偏移类型。
Others OGB-MolPCBA [212] collects molecular graphs in over 100,000 scaffolds and formulates a molecular property prediction task across different scaffolds. CivilComments [24] and Amazon[186] gather the individual comments of different users and distinctive groups (e.g. male and female). GLUE-X [280] provides a unified benchmark for evaluating OOD robustness in NLP models. Towards auto-engineering, Py150 [208] contains codes from 8,421 git repositories for code completion generalization.
其他 OGB-MolPCBA [212] 收集了超过10万个支架的分子图，并跨不同支架制定了分子属性预测任务。CivilComments [24] 和 Amazon [186] 搜集了不同用户和独特群体（例如男性和女性）的个人评论。GLUE-X [280] 为评估 NLP 模型中的 OOD鲁棒性提供了一个统一的基准。为了实现自动工程，Py150 [208] 包含了来自8421个 git 仓库的代码，用于代码完成的泛化。
1 https://www.kaggle.com/c/house-prices-advanced-regression-techniques/data
2 https://archive.ics.uci.edu/dataset/2/adult
3 https://www.cdc.gov/brfss/
4 https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/danofer/compass

7.3 Empirical Findings
7.3 实证发现

Recently, there are works investigating the OOD generalization performances in a purely empirical way, which provide valuable insights. Gulrajani and Lopez-Paz [86] find that the real effects of domain generalization approaches are relatively weak on real-world image data. Miller et al. [179] empirically show that the OOD performance is strongly correlated with in-distribution performance on image data for a wide range of deep models and distribution shifts. Yang et al. [284] release a comprehensive benchmark of 20 algorithms with 12 real-world datasets in vision, language, and healthcare domains, and they empirically study the relationships between different evaluation criteria. And Liu et al. [162] empirically validate the prevalence of Y∣X shifts in real-world tabular data, where the accuracy-on-the-line phenomena do not hold. This addresses the importance of specifying the shift patterns on tabular data, and they release a benchmark with 22 specified distribution shift patterns.
最近，有研究以纯粹经验性的方式调查了OOD泛化性能，提供了宝贵的见解。Gulrajani和Lopez-Paz [86] 发现，在现实世界图像数据上，域泛化方法的真实效果相对较弱。Miller等人[179]经验性地表明，对于广泛的深度模型和分布偏移，OOD性能与图像数据上的分布内性能强烈相关。Yang等人[284]发布了一个包含视觉、语言和医疗领域12个真实世界数据集的20种算法的全面基准，他们经验性地研究了不同评估标准之间的关系。Liu等人[162]经验性地验证了Y∣X偏移在现实世界表格数据中的普遍性，其中线上准确度现象不再成立。这指出了在表格数据上指定偏移模式的重要性，并且他们发布了一个包含22种指定分布偏移模式的基准。

8 Implications for fairness and explainability
8 对公平性和可解释性的影响

8.1 Fairness
8.1 公平性

Nowadays, fairness issues have raised great concerns in decision-making systems such as loan applications [182], hiring processes [213], criminal justice [137], personalized pricing [271], and online markets [272]. Poorly designed algorithms tend to amplify data bias, resulting in discrimination against specific subgroups of individuals based on their inherent characteristics, which are often named sensitive attributes in fairness problems. Many works define their fairness and propose corresponding fair algorithms, from which the definition of fairness can be divided into three types: individual fairness [59,293] ,group fairness [89,119,270] ,and causality-based fairness notions [120,36] . However,different fairness notions are in conflict [125]. Methods that mitigate unfairness in the algorithms fall under three categories: pre-processing [253,67,117] ,in-processing [294,295,2] , and post-processing [89] algorithms.
如今，公平性问题在决策系统中引起了极大的关注，如贷款申请[182]、招聘流程[213]、刑事司法[137]、个性化定价[271]和在线市场[272]。设计不当的算法倾向于放大数据偏见，导致基于特定个体的固有特征对某些子群体进行歧视，这些特征在公平性问题中通常被称为敏感属性。许多研究定义了它们的公平性并提出了相应的公平算法，公平性的定义可以分为三种类型：个体公平性[59,293]、群体公平性[89,119,270]和基于因果关系的公平概念[120,36]。然而，不同的公平性概念之间存在冲突[125]。减轻算法不公平性的方法分为三类：预处理[253,67,117]、处理中[294,295,2]和后处理[89]算法。
Fairness has recently been linked to OOD issues, according to Creager et al. [41]. Generally speaking, subgroups split by sensitive attributes in fairness literature correspond to environments in OOD literature. Following that, both areas need to specify learning objectives with respect to the subgroups/environments. In fairness literature, the learning objectives represent context-specific fairness notions, while in OOD literature, the learning objectives should be designed according to invariance assumptions. Similar learning objectives could be adopted in both areas. For example, objectives similar to fairness criterion equalized odds [89] are adopted in OOD literature [149, 3] to deal with simplicity bias [230]. The learning objective of IRM [11] is also similar to calibration in fairness literature [38]. Meanwhile, classical approaches from OOD literature could be applied to address fairness issues. Fair representation learning methods [61,270,303] originated from domain adaptation (DA) methods [17,75] . When sensitive attributes are unknown,DRO and adversarially learning were introduced in fairness literature [90,136,56] to obtain a distributionally robust predictor and ensure the worst subgroup performance. [119,95,123] also adopt adversarially learning methods to ensure all computationally identifiable subgroups are treated equally. As a result, Pursuing OOD could be considered as pursuing fairness concerning the subgroups/environments if the invariance assumption adopted for OOD could be viewed as a fairness notion.
最近，Creager等人[41]将公平性与OOD问题联系起来。一般来说，公平性文献中由敏感属性划分的子群体对应于OOD文献中的环境。据此，这两个领域都需要针对子群体/环境指定学习目标。在公平性文献中，学习目标代表特定情境下的公平概念，而在OOD文献中，学习目标应根据不变性假设进行设计。两个领域可以采用相似的学习目标。例如，OOD文献[149, 3]采用了与公平准则相等机会[89]相似的目标来处理简单性偏差[230]。IRM[11]的学习目标也与公平文献中的校准[38]相似。同时，OOD文献中的经典方法可以应用于解决公平性问题。公平表示学习方法[61,270,303]源于领域适应（DA）方法[17,75]。当敏感属性未知时，公平性文献中引入了DRO和对抗性学习[90,136,56]，以获得分布鲁棒预测器并确保最糟糕的子群体性能。[119,95,123]也采用对抗性学习方法，确保所有计算上可识别的子群体都被平等对待。因此，如果OOD采用的不变性假设可以视为一种公平概念，那么追求OOD可以被视为关注子群体/环境的公平性。
In addition to considering subgroups as environments, [175] investigate another scenario in which the environment is a separable variable. They studied fair classifiers that are robust to perturbations in the training distribution and devised a DRO-like method to reach their goal. Fair and robust learning is also applied in [214]. These works differ from the works listed in the last paragraph in that fairness and robustness are two objectives here whereas the aforementioned works consider them the same.
除了将子群体视为环境外，[175]研究了另一种场景，其中环境是一个可分离的变量。他们研究了对于训练分布中的扰动具有鲁棒性的公平分类器，并设计了一种类似DRO的方法来实现他们的目标。公平和鲁棒学习也应用于[214]。这些工作与上一段中列出工作的不同之处在于，这里的公平性和鲁棒性是两个目标，而上述工作将它们视为同一个目标。

8.2 Explainability
8.2 可解释性

Explanation methods can be generally divided into post hoc analyses and model-based methods [183]. There exist several works in both directions. Post hoc analyses usually explain a black-box model by calculating feature importance [1]. Typical methods include gradient-based [227, 207, 43], influence function [126], and Shapley values [171]. Model-based explanation methods often adopt simpler hypotheses such as linear regression [69], LASSO [245], generalized additive models [91], decision trees [69], and rule-based methods [70, 140].
解释方法通常可以分为事后分析法和基于模型的方法 [183]。在这两个方向上都有一些研究成果。事后分析法通常通过计算特征重要性来解释黑盒模型 [1]。典型方法包括基于梯度的 [227, 207, 43]，影响函数 [126]，以及Shapley值 [171]。基于模型的解释方法通常采用更简单的假设，如线性回归 [69]，LASSO [245]，广义加性模型 [91]，决策树 [69]，以及基于规则的方法 [70, 140]。
Causality [196] has recently been introduced to model explanation, especially in deep learning methods. Traditional deep-learning algorithms are rarely used in high-stakes applications due to their lack of explainability. Causality could provide a way to shed light on the explainability of deep learning. For example, several works adopt causality to explain deep models in textual and visual explanation [9,10,83] . Furthermore,the Causal And-Or Graph was proposed in robotics [267] and object tracking [274] to build explainable algorithms with the knowledge of causality. Kim and Canny [122] also applied a causal filtering step in self-driving automobile problems.
因果性 [196] 最近被引入到模型解释中，特别是在深度学习方法中。传统的深度学习算法由于其解释性不足，很少被用于高风险应用。因果性可能为揭示深度学习的解释性提供了一种途径。例如，有几项工作采用因果性来解释文本和视觉中的深度模型 [9,10,83]。此外，在机器人学 [267] 和目标跟踪 [274] 中提出了因果与或图，以利用因果性知识构建可解释的算法。Kim和Canny [122] 也在自动驾驶汽车问题中应用了因果过滤步骤。
(8.1)OOD⇐ Causality ⇒ Explainability. 
Actually, causality is the crux for both OOD generalization and explainability as shown in Equation (8.1). The models will have good OOD generalization performance and explainability simultaneously if they utilize the causal relationship between the features and the outcomes. Hence, explainability would be a side product when pursuing OOD generalization with causality.
实际上，正如方程（8.1）所示，因果性是OOD泛化和解释性的关键。如果模型利用了特征和结果之间的因果关系，它们将同时具有良好的OOD泛化性能和解释性。因此，在追求具有因果性的OOD泛化时，解释性将是一个副产品。

9 Conclusion and Future Directions
9 结论与未来方向

Out-of-Distribution (OOD) generalization problem has aroused much research attention recently and is critical for the deployment of machine learning algorithms. In this paper, we systematically and comprehensively review the definition, the main branches of methods, theoretical connections among different methods, and the datasets of the OOD generalization problem. Finally, we list several potential challenges in OOD generalization and we hope they could inspire future research on OOD generalization problem.
分布外（OOD）泛化问题最近引起了大量研究关注，对于机器学习算法的部署至关重要。在本文中，我们系统地、全面地回顾了OOD泛化问题的定义、方法的主要分支、不同方法之间的理论联系以及OOD泛化问题的数据集。最后，我们列出了OOD泛化中的几个潜在挑战，我们希望它们能够激发OOD泛化问题未来研究的灵感。
Theoretical characterization Although growing popular recently, the theoretical characterization of a learnable OOD generalization problem remains vague in recent literature. Characterizing the learnability of a problem is a basic question in machine learning. Though previous research efforts have been made in i.i.d. setting, the learnability is difficult to define and analyze under distributional shifts, since it is impossible to enable models to generalize to arbitrary and unknown distributions. Therefore, in OOD generalization problem, figuring out what kind of distributional shifts should be taken into consideration is critical for the analysis of learnability. There is very little exploration [286] on this and more research efforts need be paid on this.
理论表征 尽管最近越来越受欢迎，但关于可学习的OOD泛化问题的理论表征在最近文献中仍然模糊。表征问题的可学习性是机器学习中的基本问题。尽管在独立同分布（i.i.d.）设置中已经进行了先前的研究尝试，但在分布偏移下定义和分析可学习性是困难的，因为不可能使模型泛化到任意和未知的分布。因此，在OOD泛化问题中，弄清楚应该考虑哪种类型的分布偏移对于分析可学习性至关重要。关于这方面的探索[286]非常少，需要更多的研究努力。
Demands for environments Multiple training environments are required for the majority of OOD generalization methods, while in practice modern datasets are often assembled by merging data from multiple sources without keeping source labels. This greatly restricts the deployment of OOD generalization methods in real scenarios. Therefore, it is more practical and realistic that we only have access to one training environment with latent heterogeneity. Recently, while there are some works [41,157] try to leverage the latent heterogeneity and relax the demands for environments, how to explore and utilize the latent heterogeneity inside data is critical for the deployment of OOD generalization methods and is a promising future direction.
环境需求 大多数OOD泛化方法需要多个训练环境，而在实践中，现代数据集通常是通过合并来自多个来源的数据而组装的，并没有保留源标签。这极大地限制了OOD泛化方法在真实场景中的应用。因此，我们只接触到具有潜在异质性的一个训练环境是更实际和现实的。最近，虽然有一些工作[41,157]试图利用潜在异质性和放宽环境需求，但如何探索和利用数据中的潜在异质性对于OOD泛化方法的部署是关键，并且是一个有前景的未来方向。
Reasonable evaluations Although the evaluation criteria for classic machine learning algorithms under i.i.d. assumption are well-developed, including testing data, model selection mechanisms, and so on, they cannot directly be deployed to OOD scenarios. Since the testing distribution is both different and unknown from the training, how to design fair and realistic experimental settings remains a challenging problem. Further, the model selection mechanism also matters, since the choice of validation data is non-trivial in OOD scenarios, and Gulrajani and Lopez-Paz [86] also demonstrate that domain generalization algorithms without a model selection strategy are incomplete. Also, Gulrajani and Lopez-Paz [86] notice that the real effects of many domain generalization methods are weak, which indicates that existing evaluation criteria are inadequate to validate an OOD generalization algorithm. And Yu et al. [290] reflect on the evaluation protocol of domain generalization. They investigate and demonstrate the test data information leakage from pre-trained weights and a single test environment in the current evaluation protocol. Therefore, it is critical for the community to develop more reasonable evaluation criteria for OOD generalization.
合理的评价 尽管在独立同分布假设下，经典机器学习算法的评价标准已经发展得相当完善，包括测试数据、模型选择机制等，但这些标准不能直接应用于OOD（Out-of-Distribution）场景。由于测试分布与训练分布不同且未知，如何设计公平且现实的实验设置仍然是一个具有挑战性的问题。此外，模型选择机制也很重要，因为在OOD场景中，验证数据的选择并非易事，Gulrajani和Lopez-Paz[86]也证明了没有模型选择策略的领域泛化算法是不完整的。同时，Gulrajani和Lopez-Paz[86]注意到许多领域泛化方法的真实效果较弱，这表明现有的评价标准不足以验证一个OOD泛化算法。Yu等人[290]对领域泛化的评价协议进行了反思。他们研究和证明了当前评价协议中从预训练权重和单一测试环境中测试数据的信息泄露。因此，对于社区来说，开发更合理的OOD泛化评价标准至关重要。
Incorporation of Pre-Trained & Large Language Models Recently, there has been a surge in the development of large language models (or pre-trained models), such as BERT [46], GPT- 3 [25],SimCLR [33],StableDiffusion [216],ChatGPT 5 ,GPT- 46 . These models propose an approach of initially pre-training on large-scale datasets, followed by fine-tuning or directly deploying on downstream tasks. Since it's inevitable to encounter distribution shifts between downstream tasks and pre-training datasets, devising efficient pre-trained methods with strong OOD generalization ability becomes critical. Alternatively, the integration of pre-trained methods to enhance OOD generalization performance is also a promising direction for future exploration. Furthermore, it is becoming more important to evaluate the OOD generalization ability of large language models in deployment [279,258] .
集成预训练和大型语言模型 最近，大型语言模型（或预训练模型）的开发出现了激增，例如 BERT [46]、GPT-3 [25]、SimCLR [33]、StableDiffusion [216]、ChatGPT 5，GPT- 46。这些模型提出了一种方法，即首先在大规模数据集上进行预训练，然后进行微调或直接部署到下游任务。由于在下游任务和预训练数据集之间遇到分布偏移是不可避免的，因此设计具有强大OOD泛化能力的有效预训练方法变得至关重要。另外，将预训练方法集成以提高OOD泛化性能也是未来探索的一个有前景的方向。此外，在部署过程中评估大型语言模型的OOD泛化能力正变得越来越重要 [279,258]。
5 https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt
5 https://openai.com/blog/ChatGPT
6 https://openai.com/gpt-4
